name: nino begiashvili
review: Many thanks to Mr. Linmor Lin, a very attentive, professional and friendly person. He has the best products and services. He is in touch at any time of the day or night and does his best for his customers. The quality of their products has exceeded expectations. Good luck Mr. Linmor

name: Ingi Karlsson
review: Alibaba is an extremely reliable service that I have used several times through the years without a glitch.

name: Tyler Zimmerman
review: The product was made exactly as I requested, and case packed exactly as requested as well.  Everything showed up to my door step in a timely manner considering Chinese New Year was going on.

name: Michael Gardner
review: We ordered night sticks from Alibaba that were very high quality, and every single one worked out of 50.I also bought 36-inch cones with six and 4-inch reflective tape with a black base, and they are incredibly nice.I bought 28" yellow cones that were beautiful and high quality. Note: I do not give a good review unless the product is excellent. Reviews are what I count on, so I am not giving a good review unless it is earned.

name: B Dey
review: I was able to find a high quality, professial supplier very easily who made the product I needed, and had it shipped fast. I am very happy with my experience and will do business here again.

name: Mahyar
review: The quality of the products is absolutely outstanding. The assistance and support I received here are unparalleled across the entire platform. I would like to sincerely thank Mary from the bottom of my heart for her support, kindness, and professionalism. She truly deserves a 10-star rating, not just 5 stars. I am extremely happy to do business with this supplier. üòä‚öòÔ∏è

name: Willie Allen
review: OK, of course I was apprehensive about such a long-distance order process. After an initial order, the process went smooth. The delay in receiving products means you have to plan ahead and order items way in advance to seasonal needs. I see numerous products that I may add to my business model. Thanks Alibaba.

name: Curtis L Kuhr
review: I have successfully made my 4th purchase from Alibaba and I have to say that each time I buy something from them it gets better than the last‚Ä¶Itis a pleasure doing business with them and I look forward to making more purchases

name: DMOS Disanayaka
review: The Alibaba website is good because it allows you to buy goods at wholesale prices. The goods prices are reasonable. It is especially important to mention that the goods arrived without any problems within 20 days. However, the high delivery charges to Sri Lanka are a major drawback. But overall, the Alibaba website is good.

name: road runner
review: Did not refund my purchase since it was a "virtual product". It was a TV subscription from a fraudulent seller who removed the listed and their account. I al disputing this charge with Paypal, and then my credit card company.ALIBABA SUPPORTS FRAUDSTERS AND I WILL NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THIS COMPANY AGAIN AND I URGE YOU TO AVOID!

name: Pedro Filgueiras
review: I have been using Alibaba's platform for over 5 years. Alibaba has trade assurance that protects your orders. There is an incredible variety of items, good suppliers and customer services very proactive and respectful. Highly recommended

name: Veronique Coffignal
review: Ivy was very professionnal and available. She offered me great service and good communication

name: Cornelia Cassimatis
review: Great platform for finding amazing products

name: Tony V
review: Nice platform. Very trusted if you find a trusted seller.There are many scammers inside, Zero quality, customer support. Always use paypal, and revolut, otherwise there is a big chance you will lose your money.

name: Kevin Cronkrite
review: I have purchased several items, mostly solar, and every time I have received inferior equipment, equipment that does not work, damaged in shipping because of poor packaging, etc. My latest attempt at a purchase, the seller did not accept payment which says is approved on the Alibabab web site, and charged extra to purchase their equipment through Trade Assurance, which is an advertised safety to protect both seller and buyer. They also pressured me to buy with a bank transfer, which I feel is not very secure. I cancelled the sale after repeated hassle, and mark ups. I have since cancelled my account with Alibaba, and will never use their web site again. Beware.

name: K. Matti
review: I requested a refund after receiving a damaged arcade game. Despite providing photos, videos, and a signed acknowledgment of the damage from the delivery driver, my claim was denied. Alibaba initially offered me only $400 for a $7,200 purchase, which I declined, expecting a proper resolution. Instead of holding the seller accountable or facilitating an exchange, they outright rejected my claim‚Äîincluding the $400 they had originally proposed‚Äîsimply because we couldn‚Äôt agree. Thankfully, American Express is actually advocating for me. Alibaba is a complete scam, with the majority of sellers being dishonest. Avoid them at all costs, and don‚Äôt be fooled by the low prices‚Äîif it seems too good to be true, it probably is.

name: ZoAnn
review: I trust Alibaba sales groups. I have bought  variety of product through Alibaba and have been able to find what I need easily and work well with suppliers. Would prefer not to have items shipped through UPS (the add taxes that Ive never heard of to the invoice)

name: Saqib Farooq
review: Seems good. We have placed some orders which are delivered safely and also they provide safety for goods, which seems a secure way before payment

name: Alberto Borelli
review: Excellent communication and customer service.  Definitely I will do business with this seller again.

name: john
review: I cant speak highly enough of Suki. This was my first order and the patience the team showed with me and my lack of understanding regarding how to transact business was outstanding. Patient, timely, informative, and accurate. Thanks so much.

name: Doug
review: All received properly and in good condition.  Product works good, Thank you.

name: Adnan
review: I purchased a pain relief device from Alibaba and found the product extremely helpful. The build quality is excellent, and it offers effective and quick relief from discomfort. The device is lightweight, easy to use, and comes with adjustable settings to suit different needs. Alibaba's platform made the purchase process seamless, with clear product descriptions, secure payment options, and timely delivery. It‚Äôs an outstanding e-commerce platform, ideal not only for businesses but also for individuals looking for quality products at competitive prices. I am highly satisfied and happily give it a 5-star rating.

name: Eva Rosberg Cody
review: Very poor experience for a ‚Ç¨130 purchase. Never received my products. Refund application was continuously prolonged with "evidence" after "evidence" requested. Now I'm not able to get the taxes portion of the price back ~20% because of "internal rules". I lost ‚Ç¨30 and a lot of my time. Your money is NOT safe with Alibaba.

name: Scruffy Page
review: Not giving any hints on what product/s I got... ok it was 3 products, BUT, that's all you get. Except.. I was very pleased with the contents.. Value for my money was a worry  and never should have been, along with the idea given to me by previous reviews that my product just may not arrive, it arrived in record time. (Full 13 days before the "Delivery By" date! Not gunna lie, i am actually impressed. Hope this conduct is one that Alibaba sticks with as Ali could quite easily be mixing it with the best of the Shopping Tiitans we all know and love instead of being left out on the cold doorstep!! Keep this up Alibaba and your reputation could definitely get a sanitization and a reformation from degradation to the Acclamation and Oblectation of a Unification civilization leading to better recommendation.

name: Russ Strach
review: The product arrived as described and ahead of schedule.  The product arrived in two boxes and both boxes were badly damaged resulting in some chipping of the plastic foundation and the wooden frames in the other box were almost falling out upon arrival but they did not and were not damaged.

name: peter panarchia
review: Reply from Business Segment of ALIBABA is nul after my complaint to Customer Service of Alibaba.This is just a confirmation that:1) ALIBABA Customer Service is managed by means of courtesy BOT, not useful, while quickly responding with polished and generic reply2) ALIBABA doesn't take any charge nor responsibility about fake behaviour of sellers, which are hosted on the ALIBABA platform 3) the business between you, as purchaser, and any seller offering his products/services on ALIBABA is exposed to big risk of fake quotes, fake quality of product/service, loss of money and loss of your time

name: Jon
review: False Advertising Through Images: Many of the images in the listing did not accurately represent the products we received. Even the company catalog we requested failed to properly reflect the items delivered in our order on Alibaba.com.While the pricing was competitive, we are seeking long-term partnerships with suppliers and need clarity on the exact products we‚Äôd be ordering. Unfortunately, this lack of accuracy in their listings makes it difficult to establish trust or confidence in future orders.If the company were to invest time and effort into creating accurate, high-quality listings and catalogs, they could do very well. However, as it stands, they are likely to disappoint customers because the products received don‚Äôt match the images shown. For any business aiming to build lasting relationships with buyers, accurate representation is essential.

name: Tony Dan
review: I am extremely satisfied with my order. The products arrived in perfect condition and the delivery was swift and efficient. üíØü§ù

name: tim hilario
review: The suppliers that I'd encounter in Alibaba were all excellent providers of good quality products and they were quick to answer any queries asked regarding the products and provide quick assistance during and after the sales had been completed.

name: PIP
review: Alibaba fulfils my sourcing needs. Though you need to sieve through alot of suppliers before finding one you can work with.  Reporting IP  theft to Alibaba is almost  impossible. We have a professional photographer for our products, and found some Chinese stores had stolen  our photos and used on their Alibaba stores. Alibaba wanted proof the original photos which  meant our photographer signing up, find the stolen photos, file a case. Sounds easy right? Wrong! Impossible to navigate.

name: S. Khan
review: They are con, products are poorly also when things come defective they don't refund, they will say it's refunded but in reality it's not done. Be careful and shop else where.

name: Christian Quiroz
review: There is a great catalog of products and the platform is friendly to the sale process. Good companies, it could improve in delivery and logistics

name: PP
review: For two months I've been talking to different customer service representatives in Alibaba concerning technical devices I wanted to buy, they are totally incompetent of the products they are selling, have no technical understanding, they waste your time, when asking a specific question they reply hi, then you have to repeat again, then they don't get the question, then you repeat again, then you see they have no idea of the technical specifications and no idea of the technologies in these products. For them this is normal. So, after two months I still haven't bought anything, never seen something like this.

name: Stephen Hope
review: I am a repeat buyer and will continue to be. The customer service is excellent. The products are great and prices very reasonable. Shipping takes a little extra time to US, but that is fine as long as you plan for it. I am 100% satisfied customer.

name: Steven Mazabow
review: Alibaba and the 40 Thieves !!! Purchase $6600 worth of product using the Trade Assurance which states buyer shall "Enjoy protection from payment to delivery".  I received $6600 worth of useless, faulty goods and logged a case with photographic evidence and an expert report.    Alibaba issued me with a $100 refund.    I now have $6600 worth of faulty goods and Alibaba is supporting the 40 thieves.

name: Jean Y.
review: I dealt with Jane which she was very helpful and answered all my questions and concerns before I ordered the machines.  Plus she helped me with a problem by sending videos after using the product.

name: Jump Street
review: Ordered a couch set.  Horrible dealing with Atunus on the Alibaba platform.  They were supposed to get paid a deposit but charged the whole couch in advance, without permission, including undisclosed fees, then didn't deliver for four months, rather than the 2 months promised.  Thousands of dollars hanging out with no couch.  I was freaking out.  So I disputed with Alibaba.  What a joke.  Trade Assurance my ass.  Disputed with the credit card company, but they had already sent the money they tell me, so I have to bargain to get my money back, which Atunus would not do, because they didn't see a problem.  Couches show up with damaged boxes, broken pallets, 1200 lbs with no instructions and some kind of goo that could not be removed without acetone, all over the metal parts.  Asked for instructions and got the finger.  Alibaba cannot be trusted and their suppliers suck.  End of story.   Just don't believe the lies and promises like I did.

name: Ïû¨Ïù∏ Î∞ï
review: I'm very satisfied with the product's quality, shipping, and customer support. I bought it as a present, and she was really satisfied. Thank you very much!

name: Sal Montemarano
review: THEY TELL YOU ONE PRICE NOT SAYING THERE WILL BE EXTRA CUSTOM FEES, ALSO THEY HAD SAID FRIEGHT WAS INCLUDED UPTO MY PLACE OF BUSINESS WHICH ENDED UP NOT BEING TRUE HAD TO OUT A POCKET A COUPLE EXTRA THOUSAND JUST TO GET MY PRODUCT.  VERY HARD TO GET IN TOUCH WITH AFTER THE INTIAL PAYMENT WAS COMPLETED, NOW IT TAKES DAYS FOR THEM TO RESPOND. I WOULD DEFINITELY THINK TWICE BEFORE ORDERING THUR THEM AGAIN

name: Charlene
review: I don‚Äôt usually review my products (so shame on me, however, I am taking the time today to review the fans and the service I received from this company. First let me say that the minimum order is 100 fans, but before you skip reading this, with the shipping included, I paid a little over $200.  So basically, you are paying about $2.50 per fan when it comes down to it.  But what is also good is they will include the batteries.  At the beginning, I researched and compared prices, asked questions, and this company responded to me in a timely manner, so I took a chance, which I am happy that I did. I have used this company four different times now, and each time have received my wonderful fans as promised and on time.  I communicate with Kathy, who represents this company and she responds to my questions quickly.  Because the messages on these fans are important to get correct, she ensures that everything is correct.  I ordered 100 black fans with blue writing for my 65th birthday party,  which were given to all the women who entered the party (which most used to cool off after dancing); I ordered 100 black fans for my niece‚Äôs 40th birthday party to place in goodie bags on our birthday trip to Mexico (the fans were a great hit especially when the guests used them to cool off in the heat).  NOTE that I did not need 100 fans for my niece‚Äôs Mexico trip because only 22 of us went, but because the minimum order is 100, I ordered 100 and the message just read, ‚ÄúThank You for Celebrating My Birthday With Me‚Äù.  I left the 40th off and every year when she celebrates her birthday, we give it to the new guests who never received one (it‚Äôs always always a hit).  I ordered 100 fans for my sister‚Äôs friend‚Äôs aunt 90th birthday celebration, and another friend‚Äôs of mine‚Äôs mother who gave a 50th church luncheon celebration.  The wording on each of the fans were perfect.  She ordered 50 green with yellow writing and 50 yellow with green writing fans.The customer service is always on point and I really appreciate Kathy and her attentive manner to making sure my orders are correct and always delivered ahead of schedule.  Thank you Kathy so much.  Everyone loves loves loves the fans.

name: Carol Wilson
review: Rita and the team at New Jiamei Jewelry exceeded my expectations. Rita went above and beyond to ensure every detail of my order was perfect, from responding quickly to my questions to providing updates throughout the process. The earrings arrived on time, beautifully packaged, and the quality is outstanding. The craftsmanship is impeccable, and the materials used are of high quality. I highly recommend this supplier for their professionalism, dedication, and exceptional products. I look forward to working with them again!

name: Warren Booty
review: Tried to return a item they would not let me return although it turned up broken and was supplied videos and pictures to support evidence, they threw my case out when I wouldn't accept half the money and cables the product was meant to turn up with because I told them I purchased elsewhere!!! Avoid this platform

name: bkhtoppen
review: Alibaba has become a full blown offer and sales machine that is unsurpassed. The platform really serve us well in getting to find the righyt supplier and product. Payment system is flawless and the payment security is very comforting.

name: Louise
review: communication from Sales person was amazing was a delayed delivery but not down to them and communication about updates of delivery was great was always informed. Once product received very happy with it and pricing was very good.

name: Quantaden
review: QualityÔºö The product is a good quality. However, we are waiting for the customer review of the product. Once we get some actual review from our customer, we can come up with more specific issues, if anyDesignÔºö The making of the product meets our design requirement. Manufacturer also help us improving the designPackingÔºö The packing is good sofar. However, we are waiting for the reviews from our customers.On-time ShipmentÔºö The shipment time took little longer as the production time was a little delayed due to some reasons.ServiceÔºö Overall, service was delivered very professionally.

name: Mark Sinagub
review: Suby is the best to work with your projects, she cares about details and will make sure your tech pack is accurate. I have worked with them for more than a year and have not been able to find any other manufacturer as responsive and reliable. Woulds recommed 10/10 :D

name: Nencho Petkov
review: I had to buy replacement parts for electric motors for sliding doors that I am selling. The salesperson who served me made a very good impression on me. He was an amazing professional. I was left with great impressions of the staff and the working principles of this company.

name: Michael Hirt
review: LieferungÔºö Very fast deliveryQualit√§tÔºö ExcellentDesignÔºö ExcellentServiceÔºö ExcellentVery professional support and help in design and communication. Excellent quality of the product with a very short production lead time and delivery. Many thanks to the whole team!

name: Jorge
review: "I‚Äôve been ordering products through Alibaba for over a year now, and my experience has been excellent every time. The platform makes it easy to connect with reliable suppliers, and the quality of the items I‚Äôve received is always top-notch. The communication with sellers is smooth, and they are responsive and helpful throughout the process. Shipping has been timely, and the products always meet or exceed expectations. Alibaba is a fantastic resource for business owners like me, and I highly recommend it for anyone looking for dependable and high-quality suppliers. Thank you for making the process so seamless!

name: Mark SOlvie
review: Exceptionally easy to work with, wonderful quality, thoughtful in every stage of the process.   We received our product in a very reasonable amount of time from order to delivery, at a fair price, and they exceeded our expectations.   Adding the spare battery is something we did not ask for but something we normally did for our customers when sending the product out.  This supplier did that to us, as they are thoughtful of the customer in the way we are.  What a wonderful suprize.

name: Sebastien
review: Exchanges with this supplier are fluid, everything is clear, they are very responsive and accommodating.As of today, even after having received all the products, we are still discussing support for the brand, there is real follow-up, well done

name: Lapiah Renagi
review: Great customer service - trustworthy - keeping customers updated all the time. I love the product, and contact point, SAM was great.

name: Jacob Quisenberry
review: I ordered this product to replace a 21.6v 6S1P 2500mAh battery pack for the Geek Aire portable fan. The replacement battery works, and the fan charges and runs as expected.I needed to customize the battery pack (connector type, wire order) to work with fan, and the service representative walked me through options in an understandable and timely manner.. The package containing the batteries was packed securely. I received delivery ahead of schedule. I would order custom battery packs from this seller again.

name: Services IT Concepts
review: Communicating directly with first hand seller or producer simplifies a lot the communication.Usually, it helps a lot and allows to have better follow-up or understanding of the ordered products. I can only recommend Alibaba to Firms that will buy in little, medium or big bulks ! The prices are very attractive, even after counting the transport and the taxes.

name: Carson Barry
review: Seller was helpful and explained the ordering and shipment process when I let them know I was placing an order in this way for the first time. Responses to inquiries about the product and process were prompt and thorough. The product was promptly shipped and arrived quickly, considering international shipping and the 2 meter length of the product.

name: Brett Tucker
review: Great professional service, the product is excellent, good value. A pleasure to deal with. I highly recommend it.

name: Liz
review: I am a very small business in the US, and was looking for a couple of different packaging pieces for my products. In searching the US, everything was super-crazy expensive.  Plus, they were also buying from china, so I decided to use Alibaba to see if I could find a better option for my new business.   I found both packaging items on Alibaba, and the people were fabulous.  They helped me through a 5 month process of refining and finally ordering, and then shipping and see my new product packaging was a glorious experience.

name: Arlyn Parcio
review: I highly recommend this supplier. I love that I am supported from start of my order until I received my package. I love the quality of the products, and will definitely order next time. Thank you so much Alice, I really appreciate her service. five stars excellent!

name: HK
review: I had a fantastic experience with Ms Zhu , She has been incredibly approachable and always puts the customer first. name: customer
review: They were fast to respond to our messages and got the product done very quickly. Shipped super fast and the quality was fantastic. This is our 3rd time ordering from them because they're so great!

name: yasir amad
review: I would like to thank Sparta Company for this wonderful service and quick response and solving any problem I faced during the installation of the device and fast charging. The durability and quality of the product were high after inspection. I also thank the sales manager Lia nie for her patience with me from the period of purchasing the device until its arrival and installation. The products were suitable for my purpose.

name: Griffin B
review: Wanted to buy a product on their site, there was no shipping information. I requested a shipping quote last night and never got it. So I tried again today. Instead, they tried to sell me a completely different product and as of this review, still haven't responded to my simple request of a shipping quote. I won't buy from them, and will not recommend them.

name: PlayerRai
review: Payments are secure. I was amazed at how I received the product within 10 days. I am unsure about product claims such as storage space for laptops and smartphones. The phone I ordered has 1TB of storage, but 103 GB is used.

name: Erti
review: I‚Äôve ordered from this seller multiple times, and I am always impressed! The quality of the products is consistently excellent, and everything matches the descriptions perfectly. I especially appreciate the reliable and friendly customer service ‚Äì any questions or concerns are addressed quickly and professionally. Shipping is always on time, and the items arrive well-packaged. It‚Äôs always a pleasure to shop here, and I highly recommend this seller. Thank you for the great experience!

name: Kien Doan
review: Everything went well and the seller is very responsive, transparent, and highly flexible in finding the right solution for my need. Also i'm fully satisfied with the service, the product is also good agaist the price. I would highly recommend the seller and their products.

name: Travis Howland
review: This seller made communication easy and was always prompt to reply and correct / make adjustments as needed. Was extremely easy to use this seller and I'll absolutely be using them again for future orders.

name: Jayson Montalvo
review: I couldn't be happier with my purchase! The product's quality exceeded my expectations‚Äîsturdy, well-crafted, and exactly as described. Plus, the price is unbeatable for what you get. The shipping process was handled smoothly, with regular updates from the team, so I always knew where my package was and when to expect it. I really appreciated the clear and consistent communication throughout the entire process, which made me feel like a valued customer. I highly recommend this product, and I'll definitely be purchasing more in the future. Thank you for a great experience!

name: Raul
review: Highly recommended. The product offers great value for its price and delivers on all fronts. Perfect for anyone looking for high quality products.

name: Solaris Foto
review: We ordered UV printed coasters on Alibaba and had a great experience.  The company we worked with communicated well throughout the entire process and the products and printing quality are awesome!  We will definitely be ordering from them again.

name: Chang Liu
review: Service and products' quality are really good. Eventhought the shipping took long time, but overall experience is good!highly recommand!!!

name: Jeppe
review: My product never arrived. Was delivered in France, while I live in Denmark? This was acknowledged by Alibaba, but they just told me to contact the shipper? which went broke. No refund was proposed. Super bad experience. Never alibaba again...

name: Nicole Clement
review: I have never purchased product from overseas, so I must admit I was very nervous about this entire experience.  I have been thoroughly impressed about this entire process with ensuring my product was received prior to releasing payment.  I will definitely utilize Alibaba again!

name: GR-Dealer-Dan
review: On Alibaba it was easy to find supplier or manufacturers for the products we wanted.Alibaba is always our first choice.

name: Robin Kongerslev
review: I recently purchased a set of keychains, and I couldn‚Äôt be more satisfied with the quality. The craftsmanship is outstanding, and the materials used feel premium and durable. On top of that, the delivery was prompt, and the customer service team was responsive and helpful throughout the process. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for stylish and well-made keychains. Will definitely shop here again!

name: Murat USLU
review: ƒ∞Has strong communication with customers. It tracks the products from the cargo until they are delivered to the customer. I'm going to review the last product I bought a bit. I hope it meets my needs.

name: Moe
review: Trade Assurance protects you so don't be scared! They have some astounding suppliers if you just pay attention to credentials, reviews, etc. They make it easy to find the ones with the best products at the best prices. Try it once, I bet you'll try it again

name: Anya
review: Great platform for ordering products. The messaging app is secure and easy to use and makes me feel like ordering is legit.

name: Yaridia Lomeli
review: Alibaba "The trust Company to buy Products"Thank you for providing an easy platform to find a trusted supplier. This was my first purchasing experience in M√©xico.

name: Jef Frey
review: Impossible to stop constant bombardment of emails , link to unsubscribe obviously purposely  disconnected as is ability to access account so as to stop this bombardment . They have no intention of answering any email requests  no way I will ever order any products from them an absolute nightmare in faces with having to delete my email account to stop them .

name: Franz
review: Very helpful to search many products that you never get in europe to such a good price! Sometime with a import tax to pay otherwise with no import tax. but all together is cheaper then a europe shop!

name: Ray Watson
review: It was a pleasure to deal with May, she was very helpful and as a result I got the cap and logo I wanted, Will definitely order again.

name: Natalie Shifrin
review: Bad experience.  Made a purchase.  Got a tracking number stating product was delived . Reported to Alibaba  Never recieved a product or money back.

name: jessicastrom
review: Excellent product, received item swiftly, professional seller with great communication, good price for item. I am happy.

name: Gia Roma LLC
review: Trade assurance has become worthless.  We order a lot in bulk here.  Lately when we have received poorly made products or wrong products. Alibaba trade assurance has done absolutely nothing to protect us.  We provide indisputable proof between pictures, videos, chat logs, samples received vs final products sent.  Yet trade assurance does nothing when we receive the bad products.  After buying on here for 10+ years and spending tons of money.  I am no longer feeling safe as a buyer.  As I now know if my products are not what we agreed on, are poor quality, or wrong alibaba will do nothing but the bare minimum to cover it.  This is not okay.  Manufacturers should be required to uphold their end of contracts.  Buyers should get what was discussed and confirmed.  If buyers get incorrect products, damaged products, etc.  The seller should not get paid all of the money.  All trade assurance disputes are always favoring the seller over the buyer constantly now.  It's sad.  Can no longer depend on alibaba with our money.

name: Martin Nahuel Larrosa Maurer
review: The offers and prices are highly competitive, good products offered, quick response from sellers, ease of use of the platform.

name: Nick Staropoli
review: Carol is always a message away gets back to me very fast with the help I need stands behind there product and sell good quality items.

name: Ashrath's Emporium
review: We have purchased many times from Alibaba and they have been nothing but very professional to deal with. Also they give us peace of mind from the first till the last when the product is sitting in your store, checking on it all along. Very good to work with!!!

name: ahmed Mouloud
review: Absolutely worst customer support and refund management for the customers. They're heavily supplier sided. I have placed over 80 orders in Alibaba and the first time I request a refund for a product that has been of poor quality and basically didn't work, I was met with a consistent refusal by their support to accept my simple request: Return the remaining quantity of 155 pcs to the supplier on my own fees and get a partial refund for that exact quantity. Guess what, even after providing videos demonstrating the quality and issues of the product, "Shopia" from their customer support literally told me you have shown me the issue with one product and not all products. She wants me to go through 155 units one by one and show that they are all the same, that's absolutely crazy!!! She also responded that "courtesy" of them, they'll apply for a request of $300 credit subject to approval (not guaranteed) while I keep the stocks worth $420, which I will ust throw in the garbage cause ain't no way I am shipping that junk to my customers. All in all 1 star management and very VERY supplier sided, which shocked me, I thought we were the customers not the suppliers. Here are the details: Case #100032620089Order #225297266001025060

name: Steven A DeLaura
review: Would give a zero but not an option so a rating of one is generous. Bought a product, and product not delivered and company took my dad's money. I immediately stepped in to help and no responses to our e-mails and chats. You cannot call them on the phone to explain., worst experience and company I have ever dealt with. It's like you are talking to someone in space, and nobody is there to answer. We called the better business bureau (look at those reviews and see the true story) and the FBI to report this company.Tip for consumers:Have somebody answer our chats, emails, California phone number we called *******580 in 525 Almanor Ave. in Sunnyvale, CALeave message and nobody returns calls. Was hard enough to find the number to even call.Products used:Never shipped item/product and basically stole my dads money and we have no product and they have $1,500 of his moneyDisgraceful/fraud

name: Ya its me
review: I can not recommend using this platform...As many others have stated Alibabas Trade Assurance is a come on scam.We purched 6500.00 worth of tool cabnits from "Quindao Chrecary International Trade Co"  All during the Q and A process they told me how great their products and services are. How they stood behind there products with a 2 year warentee and how they had State Side service reps to handle any claims. Alibaba also claims to have your back.  I have been dealing with a damaged Cabnit of over 2 months now and all I get are excuses.  The seller is communicating with me but tells me there is nothing they can personally do that Insurance won't cover the damage. Well then they should send me a replacement unit right?  Nope they are unwilling to do that as well.  If you buy anything from this platform it's like going to a Casino and placing that money on the Roulette table. The quality of these cabnits from this vender is claimed to be Snapon quality...That's a lie...They are worse then Harbor Freights cheapest quality cabnits.   Stay clear of this vender and Stay clear of Alibaba.

name: Angela Dominick
review: I have spent hundreds of thousands on alibaba over the years.  It is now turning into a site you absolutely cannot depend on and I'm not saying because of bad quality or rip offs.  As there have always been many suppliers on there like that.  But before if you didn't get what you paid for.  The product was not like the sample you received, the product was wrong, poor quality, and you had evidence to back all of this up.  Alibaba would do something.  Now they ask you for all of this evidence and then say it doesn't matter after you take the time to provide it.  They make the entire "trade assurance" process completely one sided.  They are not there to protect buyers at all anymore.  I have 2 horrible shipments now and alibaba offered a measly 5% of coverage for the bad products.  The entire process was completely one sided after we received BACKWARDS products and much smaller than confirmed.  The list goes on. Alibaba - get it together.  As we are noticing this and it's not okay.  We need a platform we can trust to back up our hard earned money.  If a supplier doesn't do what they should, penalize them.  The quality is lacking more and more, because manufacturers know they can now get away with it.

name: Amanda
review: Product was as required.  Service is fabulous, delivery was first class as i had left a very short time frame and was delivered on time.  The price is competitive and a great company to work with. Thank you

name: Midnight.c
review: My Disastrous Experience with an Alibaba Supplier: A Warning for BuyersWhen I decided to place an order through Alibaba, I expected a professional experience and high-quality products. Unfortunately, what I received was far from what was promised. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of my experience, which I hope will serve as a warning to others.Broken Promises of QualityThe supplier, Naqash Arshad, who works for Highspark Industries, confidently assured me that their products were of the highest quality. However, the reality was vastly different:The prints on the hoodies deteriorated after just one wash.Some sweaters arrived with black stains, holes, and in one instance, a missing pocket.The hood shape of the hoodies was completely different from what we had agreed on, failing to match the specifications we had discussed in detail.Overall, the production did not meet the agreed-upon standards, despite clear and repeated communication about my requirements.Unprofessional BehaviorThe supplier‚Äôs conduct throughout this process was nothing short of unprofessional:They pushed me to move off the Alibaba platform to communicate via WhatsApp, violating the platform‚Äôs rules and stripping me of the protections Alibaba offers.They requested unsecured payment methods, which seems like a deliberate attempt to prevent me from filing complaints later.When issues arose, they took more than two weeks to respond to my messages regarding a refund, showing a complete lack of accountability.A Production DisasterThe entire production was a disaster, from the lack of quality control to the blatant disregard for our agreed specifications. This experience has been both frustrating and disappointing.Lesson Learned: Avoid Naqash Arshad and Highspark Industries at All CostsIf you are considering working with a supplier on Alibaba, especially Naqash Arshad or Highspark Industries, I highly recommend avoiding them at all costs. Their unprofessional behavior, lack of quality control, and disregard for agreements will likely lead to frustration and financial loss.When working with suppliers, always ensure:All communication remains on the platform to protect your transaction.Payments are made through Alibaba‚Äôs secure payment systems to give you recourse if issues arise.The supplier has a solid track record of positive reviews and high ratings.Unfortunately, I failed to follow these precautions, and it resulted in a disastrous experience. I hope my story helps others avoid the same fate.

name: Arabella Simmons
review: Unless you have money to throw away, alibaba can no longer be depended on.  Numerous times lately our finished products are either different than samples, incorrect, wrong sizes, wrong pantone colors, etc.  Fine no big deal Can make some work.  But when you receive products you can't sell due to factories mistake? Don't plan on getting your money back and if you do, it will only be a small portion of what is requested. We received 6,000 BACKWARDS products.  These products have words on them, so backwards they clearly don't make any sense.  What does alibaba do? Nothing.  They ask for evidence, you provide it.  After spending hours taking, labeling, uploading all evidence. Then says "sizes van vary when cutting" (as these products were also 1-2" smaller than discussed (they are a small item, so it's a huge size difference for this product).  We know if products are sized correctly on the file, "cutting" doesn't vary the size we confirmed with supplier.  It's just a load of BS.   Why waste our time asking for evidence through trade assurance case, if you're not going to use it? The past 2 times the employee named "Grace" through trade assurance, is the WORST.  We've bought on alibaba for over a decade.  The past 2 times I've gotten the one named "grace" this employee is worthless on trade assurance.  Providing endless evidence for our case, that was asked for (after a decade we know everything needed), yet it's ignored and seller is yet again protected on alibaba.  Trade assurance is absolutely worthless lately.  Alibaba if you see this: you better do something to change this, as it's becoming more widely known about these issues and you're going to end up losing a lot more money if you continue protecting bad sellers and the bad products they supply.  As we will no longer be doing business with alibaba.  That's over at least 600k+ we spent yearly there.

name: Phil B
review: I've been using Alibaba for about 10 years without any major issues. However, in September 2024, I placed an order where the supplier ignored my clear packaging specifications. They packed 3,600 products in bags that were much larger than we had specified. As a result, these products now fall into a higher Amazon tier, drastically increasing our shipping fees. This means that selling them would result in a financial loss.We provided Alibaba with all the evidence, including the original order instructions we sent to the supplier, and trusted that Trade Assurance would protect us. Unfortunately, that hasn't been the case. Despite clear evidence of the supplier's mistake and the financial loss it caused, Alibaba took the supplier‚Äôs side, leaving us without proper recourse.Now, we are forced to throw away 3,600 products because selling them would put us further in the red. We're not just losing inventory; we're out thousands of dollars. The packaging mistake wasn‚Äôt minor‚Äîit's directly tied to the product's usability and profitability.Despite Alibaba claiming to offer Trade Assurance protection, it's clear that their priority is to shield their suppliers, not the buyers. We used Alibaba's payment system because we believed it provided security, but this experience has proven that they care very little about protecting their customers.This has been a devastating experience, and we expected much more from a platform we've trusted for nearly a decade.Furthermore, Alibaba will not allow me to leave a review for the supplier. I would not trust anything you see on this website. It seems the company is protecting their suppliers at the cost of the buyers.

name: Randy Smith
review: I am incredibly impressed with Erasmart Company and the exceptional products and services they offer. Erasmart has consistently proven to be a top-tier provider for all things DTF (Direct to Film), including their premium DTF printers, high-quality supplies, and efficient delivery services. Their products stand out in terms of both performance and reliability, which has made a significant difference in my business.The DTF printers from Erasmart deliver outstanding print quality with vivid colors, fine details, and unmatched durability. These printers are well-engineered and user-friendly, perfect for both beginners and professionals. Erasmart‚Äôs supplies are equally impressive ‚Äì from films to inks, everything is carefully curated for optimal results, ensuring that every print job meets the highest standards.When it comes to delivery, Erasmart is prompt and reliable, consistently meeting deadlines and ensuring that orders arrive in perfect condition. This level of dependability is essential, and Erasmart always delivers, allowing me to operate my business smoothly without delays.Their customer support team deserves special praise. They are knowledgeable, responsive, and always ready to go the extra mile to help. Whether it‚Äôs a technical question or a minor troubleshooting issue, they respond quickly and efficiently. Having such dependable support has been invaluable.Overall, Erasmart‚Äôs combination of product quality, supply reliability, prompt delivery, and excellent customer service makes them a standout choice in the DTF printing industry. I highly recommend Erasmart to anyone seeking quality and professionalism in their DTF printing needs.

name: NJ
review: Alibaba.com is AliExpress they are both the same company.An Update on My Experience with AliExpressI recently encountered a frustrating issue with AliExpress. They requested video and photo evidence to prove that certain items I purchased were not fit for purpose. After submitting the requested materials, which clearly demonstrated the items were unusable, they acknowledged the issue but only offered a 70% refund. This is unacceptable‚Äîwhy should I be expected to pay 30% for products that are completely worthless and unusable?I explained that their refusal to fully refund these items undermines trust in all other purchases I have made through their platform. If future items developed faults, their handling of this case suggests they would likely refuse to replace or refund those as well. To address this, I requested a full list of all my purchases from the beginning, along with arrangements to collect the items and issue a full refund. Unfortunately, all my requests have been ignored.I strongly advise against buying from AliExpress or any affiliated companies. Their customer service practices and refusal to honor fair refund policies are unacceptable.Recommendations for Other BuyersIf you‚Äôve paid AliExpress using PayPal, I recommend immediately filing a refund request through PayPal. If PayPal denies your claim, escalate the matter to your bank. Many banks allow you to initiate chargebacks for purchases made with a debit card linked to PayPal.To ensure maximum protection, always link your PayPal account to a debit card rather than a bank account. Payments made via direct debit from a bank account may not qualify for the same level of buyer protection. To check your PayPal setup, log in, go to the ‚ÄúWallet‚Äù section, and confirm that only your debit card is linked. Remove any direct debit links to your bank account to avoid potential issues.Final ThoughtsBased on my experience, AliExpress operates in a manner that feels deceitful. They build trust with buyers initially, but when issues arise, they fail to provide adequate resolutions. Their refusal to replace or refund faulty items is alarming, and I consider this behavior equivalent to theft.I urge potential buyers to exercise caution and avoid shopping with AliExpress. If you‚Äôve experienced similar issues, take action to recover your funds and consider spreading awareness to protect other consumers.Unfortunately, disputes like these with platforms such as AliExpress are common, as their resolution process often leans toward sellers.Here‚Äôs a quick breakdown of your points and suggestions for others who might face similar issues:	1.	Refund and Dispute Issues on AliExpress:¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†AliExpress often asks for proof (photos, videos) in disputes, which can feel unfair when the items are clearly faulty or useless.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†Their partial refund offers are often a way to minimize losses on their end. However, accepting only a partial refund when the product is entirely unusable is understandably unacceptable.	2.	Using PayPal for Added Protection:¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†If you paid through PayPal, disputing directly through them is often more effective, as PayPal tends to side with buyers in clear-cut cases of faulty goods.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†As you suggested, linking PayPal to a debit card rather than a bank account offers better protection because banks can help initiate chargebacks on debit card payments.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†Regularly review your PayPal account setup to ensure it‚Äôs aligned with your preferences for buyer protection.	3.	Raising Awareness and Taking Further Action:¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†Sharing your experience (as you‚Äôve done here) is a good way to warn others.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†If AliExpress refuses to address the issue adequately, a bank chargeback or formal complaint to consumer protection organizations may be your next steps.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†You might also consider leaving reviews on public forums, trust platforms, or app stores to warn others.	4.	General Advice to Avoid Similar Scenarios:¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†When purchasing from platforms like AliExpress, stick to highly rated sellers with positive reviews and detailed product descriptions.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†Avoid large purchases or items with questionable quality unless you‚Äôre prepared for potential issues.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†Always document everything (order details, communication, etc.) in case you need to escalate disputes.Spread awareness and fight for a refund are valid.

review: I received my order today and I am very happy with entire experience with Alibaba.com, the online customer service is outstanding, the communication is great and much easier than any other online shopping I have ever experienced, the product was packed tight and secure in good sturdy boxes, The shipping was right on time and was fully monitored the whole process right down to the phone call from the courier before the final drop, and I will say that after years of wanting to buy from Alibaba but getting clobbered by high shipping, something magical has happened because I found that the shipping was not bad at all or even as good as the cost for shipping in the US,  It's nice to now have this better option to get products for better prices and a more pleasant experience, Thanks Alibaba, and all those involved in making this possible......Sincerely ;  Curtis L Kuhr

name: Brooke Bass
review: I ordered a UTV on Alibaba through their supplier. The supplier required I pay cash to their company and promised no additional fees. They even touted their insurance company that would reimburse a buyer, should any unexpected additional fees arise.  I started out with a purchase of $1249 and before it was over, all additional fees added up to $21,109.  I refused to pay the final unexpected fee, with the product held in another country, where the product should not have been off loaded.  Now it is not being delivered and I have paid a total of $11,909!  The salesman lied throughout the transaction saying no additional fees would be charged, the shipper looks like a fraud, and I question whether the product was ever shipped at all.  I would never use this Alibaba again unless Alibaba makes a full refund, or makes this seller deliver the product. It appears they do not vet their suppliers properly. Don't risk your money!

name: David Dardar
review: I recently purchased a year-long subscription to AutoCAD, which required an existing Autodesk account‚Äîa prerequisite that was duly provided. I was assured that the activation process would be seamless: once the email address was entered, my membership would become active. However, despite the passage of over a month, this has not occurred. My Autodesk account still indicates that I have no active membership.When I reached out to Alibaba‚Äôs customer service for assistance, I was met with a dismissive response. They merely reiterated that the membership had been activated and offered no further support, essentially insinuating that my concerns were unfounded.Following this, I purchased a membership for Nitro PDF, only to encounter a similar issue. The membership failed to activate, despite my compliance with the convoluted instructions provided by customer service‚Äîinstructions that were never communicated prior to the purchase. Once again, I found myself with a dead membership and a pointless expenditure.While the competitive pricing of these products initially attracted me, it is becoming clear that these purchases amount to nothing more than wasted resources. Successful small transactions are the foundation of long-term business relationships, but given these repeated failures, future purchases are now highly improbable.

name: Reuel Lento
review: As a loyal Alibaba user since 2013, I have made countless purchases totaling hundreds of thousands of dollars with consistently positive experiences. However, my recent encounter with Alibaba's customer support has been nothing short of a nightmare.I purchased a machine from a supplier who offered a one-year warranty, explicitly stated in the order and protected by Trade Assurance. The machine malfunctioned within a short period, causing significant financial losses for my company. The supplier became unresponsive, leaving me with a broken machine and no recourse.I turned to Alibaba for assistance, hoping they would uphold their commitment to protecting buyers. Instead, I was met with a series of empty promises and bureaucratic runarounds. After five attempts to contact customer support, including requests for managerial intervention, I received the same dismissive response:"However, according to our policy for the offline transaction, Alibaba only handles 2 types of offline disputes: ‚ÄúProducts Not Received after Payment‚Äù and ‚ÄúPayment not Received after Shipping‚Äù. Other offline disputes will no longer be handled. Please actively contact the seller for communication and negotiation."This response is utterly absurd. It demonstrates a blatant disregard for customer protection and a complete reversal of Alibaba's previous stance. It is evident that I have been left to fend for myself, despite the supplier's clear breach of contract.I urge Alibaba to reconsider their decision in my case (Service No.: #CaseNo:2058057112175463# or 2058057112175628). This experience has shattered my trust in Alibaba and left me with no choice but to warn other potential buyers.Please note that I am sharing this review publicly to raise awareness about Alibaba's deteriorating customer support and to encourage them to take responsibility for their actions.

name: Albert Mansur
review: IF I CAN GIVE MINUS -10 I WOULD-BELOW IS WHAT this is ongoing for nearly 2 months.I SENT ALIBABA FOR 30 DAY REFUND POICY AND THEY REPLIED THE SUPPLIER IS RIGHT AND MANUFACTURER IS WRONG EVEN AFTER SENDING THEM EMAIILFROM MANUFACTURER CLEARLY STATING THE 2 PRODUCTS ARE "NOT THE SAME" THEY STILL SIDE WITH SUPPLIER.SENT THEM OVER 10 PHOTOS AND VIDEO EVIDENCE AND ALIBAB SAYS, BUT THE SPPLIER SAYS DIFFENT. HOW DISGUSTING. DONT BUY ANYTHING FROM THIS SHONKY PLACE. placed order on 22nd of May 2024 didn't receive until 2nd of July 2024 but was told I would receive it within 20-25 days(see attached) well over 30days. It is not a AKX10 as advertised it's a A2000, which are two completely different keyboards. Chinese interface software not English was supplied as stated by them. English sticker to be provided but it‚Äôs cardboard which doesn‚Äôt fit the panel and damaged. (see attached). It is not a Medeli AKX10 with English Software interface it‚Äôs in Chinese as per photos/video. I asked him several times that it was in English (see messages) which he confirmed it was. This was a birthday present for my son and has cost our family a terrible amount of stress and money. I have been in contact with Medeli Head Office in Hong Kong (Joe is the representative there). I have attached the email from Joe where he clearly states that the A2000 cannot use AKX10 firmware and they are 2 totally different models and English is only available on Chinese website to translate, not as firmware which corrupts the A2000 computer. Also, the expansion on A2000 is only 256M and on the AKX10 it is 756M. Attached are the photos of his website selling this product as Medeli AKX10 which is what I thought I was getting. This is False Advertising. In my conversations with him (attached) he told me it was on a plane, then says I picked Shipping. I clearly told him I needed it by 15th June, and he said it had already been delivered to the warehouse? More lies. It didn‚Äôt leave China until 8th June according to SHIPS24. I would like a full refund of my money plus compensation. They can have the A2000 back and I will gladly drop it off at SHIPS24 where I picked it up from, but I am not paying for shipping fees to return it. Once I have my money back, I will take it to SHIPS24 in Thomastown, Melbourne for return. They ARE negligent in their advertising and service. name: STD Donald
review: We are a long-time user of Alibaba and issue tens of thousands of dollars in orders regularly on their platform. For the longest time, their platform was great, matching up business with vendors in China. But three months ago we had a terrible experience with one supplier. They took our money and refused to send us proofs of products, then shipped incorrect products to us almost a month late without even an acknowledgment or an apology. So this is the first time we have had to use the Trade assurance guarantee because the vendor ignored our requests for a remedy. This is an open and shut case. The Alibaba timeline shows that we asked the vendor for proof five times, and they ignored us, then they shipped the wrong product, which cost us thousands of dollars in rework in the USA. So, we tried to dispute the order with Alibaba using their Trade Assurance Guarantee. It has been three(3) MONTHS without any help or resolution from the dispute mediator. I have filed three separate complaints to Alibaba about our experience, and they committed to escalate and remedy, only to be ignored each time. The mediator, Zack, does not answer any questions from us, refuses to make a decision, and has truly been incompetent. This is an open and shut case. We proved that the supplier did not send us proofs; they shipped us what they wanted, which was wrong, and Alibaba has done nothing to help. I'm suspicious that there is something illegal going on between the mediator and the supplier. It's that bad. So, I've been online looking for new alternatives to Alibaba. We will take our business elsewhere. DON'T RELY ON ALIBABA TRADE ASSURANCE; their folks are not competent or qualified.

review: I recently purchased some customized products through Alibaba and I am absolutely delighted with the quality and service. From the very beginning, the interaction with Candy has been exceptional. Candy has always been very attentive and professional, ensuring that all my needs and specifications were met. The customization of the products exceeded my expectations, with impeccable finishes and a design exactly as I had imagined.Communication with Candy has been smooth and pleasant, making the entire purchasing process very comfortable and satisfying. The attention to detail in the customization and the high quality of the materials used have been truly remarkable.The only area for improvement I can point out is that we experienced some issues with customs, which resulted in a longer-than-expected delay in receiving the products. However, this does not overshadow the overall excellent experience and satisfaction with the products received.In summary, I highly recommend this supplier on Alibaba for their fantastic service, high-quality customized products, and Candy's professionalism. I will definitely purchase from them again in the future!

name: Kenneth Bowers
review: Here's a general review for Alibaba:---**Review of Alibaba**Alibaba, a global e-commerce giant, has established itself as a powerhouse in the online retail and wholesale market. Founded by Jack Ma in 1999, the company has grown exponentially, offering a wide array of services that cater to both businesses and consumers worldwide.**E-commerce Platform:**Alibaba's e-commerce platform is one of the largest and most comprehensive in the world. It provides a vast marketplace where businesses can source products directly from manufacturers, often at competitive prices. The platform is user-friendly, offering numerous tools and features that make it easy to navigate and find products. The variety of products available is staggering, ranging from electronics to clothing to industrial machinery.**Customer Service:**Customer service on Alibaba can be hit or miss. While many users have positive experiences, especially with responsive and professional sellers, there are instances where communication barriers and misunderstandings can occur. However, Alibaba provides a robust dispute resolution system to help mitigate these issues.**Shipping and Logistics:**Alibaba's logistics network is impressive, with partnerships with various shipping companies to ensure global reach. The shipping times can vary significantly depending on the seller and the shipping method chosen. It's essential for buyers to check shipping terms carefully and communicate with sellers to ensure timely delivery.**Alibaba Cloud:**Alibaba Cloud, the company's cloud computing arm, has grown to become a significant player in the cloud services market. It offers a wide range of services, including data storage, artificial intelligence, and machine learning solutions. The platform is reliable and scalable, making it a strong competitor to other major cloud service providers.**Payment Security:**Alibaba takes payment security seriously, offering secure payment options like Alipay. Alipay provides an escrow service, ensuring that funds are only released to the seller once the buyer confirms receipt of the goods. This adds a layer of protection for buyers, making transactions safer.**Innovation and Expansion:**Alibaba is continually innovating and expanding its services. The company has invested heavily in technology, including artificial intelligence and blockchain, to enhance its offerings. Additionally, Alibaba's expansion into new markets and sectors, such as digital entertainment and financial services, demonstrates its ambition to diversify and grow.**Conclusion:**Overall, Alibaba is a formidable force in the e-commerce and technology sectors. Its extensive product range, competitive pricing, and innovative services make it a valuable resource for businesses and consumers alike. While there are occasional challenges with customer service and shipping, the company's commitment to improving its platform and services is evident. Whether you're a small business looking to source products or a tech-savvy individual seeking cloud solutions, Alibaba has something to offer.---

name: Peter Omisore
review: This is a rip off of a company and a shyster of a company let everybody beware of doing business with Alibaba as you won't get your money back from them if anything goes wrong regardles of their so called "trade assurances". Below is the email I just received from Aliobaba in response to my trade dispute with the seller over a non functioning mobile I purchased from them :"„ÄêAction Required„ÄëEvidence is required for your refund application for Trade Assurance Order No. 207519530001020995Dear Peter Omisore:Please do not reply to this email.This mailbox is not monitored and you will not receive a response. Please log into the related Trade Assurance order to check the status of your case and give your response or provide the evidence there.Dear Peter ,Good Day!This is Nicole from Alibaba.com. This email is about your trade assurance order 207519530001020995.We understand you are not satisfied with the goods. In order to better help you, please provide us with sufficient evidence to support your complaint.Please provide us with valid evidence within 2 working days:Please specify the quality issue and provide clear pictures of all the items you think with quality defects.For functional issue, please take a clear video to show all the defective items. The video should be no bigger than 500MB and no longer than 10 minutes.Have you received 2 mobile phones? Please reply on the dispute page.Thank you very much for your patience. We have assisted you in contacting the merchant. According to your response on the dispute page, you have already used the product. Please provide a video or picture of any issues that occurred during the use of the product within 2 working days.After communicating with the merchant, they agreed to a refund of 50 USD and the buyer will keep the goods. Buyers can have it repaired locally.If you agree, please reply yes.Thank you for your understanding~Best Regards,NicoleAlibaba Trade Dispute Mediation Department"So, Ijust paid $615 for a mobile phone but I should now take it to a mobile phone shop for repairs and they will refund me $50 for my trouble - this tells you all you need to know about this RIP OFF MARKETPLACE - BE WARNED:

name: Cha, Cha, Cha Chia Chia
review: I'm utterly disappointed with Alibaba's plummeting standards. What was once a beacon of hope for global trade has now devolved into a cesspool of deception and fraud.Scammers run rampant on Alibaba, employing bait-and-switch pricing tactics that would make any ethical business owner cringe. The prices displayed are a mere mirage, leading unsuspecting buyers into a labyrinth of inflated costs and subpar products.What's even more alarming is the blatant disregard for security and transparency. Many sellers insist on payment through Zelle or wire transfers, bypassing Alibaba's payment system altogether. It's a red flag waving so vigorously it's practically slapping you in the face. Yet, Alibaba seems content to turn a blind eye, washing its hands of any responsibility.Reporting these deceitful sellers falls on deaf ears. Alibaba's lackluster response to such egregious misconduct is a slap in the face to honest buyers trying to navigate this treacherous marketplace.To anyone considering dealing with Chinese sellers on Alibaba, tread cautiously. They're not just dishonest; they're wolves in sheep's clothing, waiting to pounce on unsuspecting prey. Save yourself the headache and heartache and steer clear of Alibaba's deceitful denizens.

review: The experience will be great when:1- The contact person speaks good English.2. The supplier and the buyer build a long relationship together. 3- Some companies did not answer the question: Are you a factory or a trading company? This is bad behavior.4- Most suppliers charge for the sample order even it is one unit. I think this is not good practice if the company is not able to send a sample for free.5- I think, it is not appropriate to pay a tax to order just a sample to check the product. The sample must be easy to obtain for a cheap price.

name: Peter Omisore
review: I placed an order for two Oneplus 12 mobile phones from the Fuzhou Century City company on Alibaba which were promptly delivered to my address in Europe. When I opened the boxes first thing I noticed was that they contained Chinese charging cables which couldn't be used in Europe, and although I wasn't pleased about this I thought no big deal.One of the phones was for my wife and I gave it to her, she switched on the phone and went through the process of transferring all the data from her old phone onto the new one and after she had finished doing this the Oneplus 12 just switched off and it wouldn't switch on again no matter what we tried.I immediately contacted the saleswoman I had been dealing with at this Fuzhou company to inform her of the problem as we had only just received the phones less than an hour ago, she was totally unhelpful right from the start telling us to charge up the phone but the phone was already charged and was showing over 80% battery capacity when it switched off and wouldn't come on again. I left the phone on the charger for a couple of hours but it still wouldn't switch on or show any other sign of life apart from getting a bit warm. All this while I was exchanging messages with the seller who has absolutely ZERO customer service and she was implying that I was lying about the phone being dead and even insinuating that I had somehow damaged the phone, really terrible customer service and after care and I was getting really angry by this time as after spending $615 on a mobile phone the very least thing I expect is for that phone TO ACTUALLY WORK.She was demanding all kinds of unreasonable stuff from me like "proving" the phone doesn't work, how the hell do you prove a phone doesn't work without you sending the phone back to them ? The last suggestion this woman made to me was to take the phone to a mobile phone shop and let them check it out, are you nuts ???? I just spent $615 on a brand new phone and I have to take it to a mobile phone shop ???Completely AND TOTALLY UNHELPFUL company and staff to deal with and I have raised a dispute with Alibaba for a refund and my messenger has now been disabled from contacting the seller which doesn't look very promising as many customers complain that Alibaba always takes the side of their fraudulent sellers.People need to beware when ordering from Alibaba and are better off obtaining products from more reputable companies with a  fairer despute resolution process. I am still waiting on Alibaba to resolve my claim.

name: Michael Soaries
review: Contracted with a seller to produce a product by a specific date. Seller took their time (holidays and errkrnd off for one thing). Rather than manage the time with their "team" they poked along and when confronted with the closing timeline they swore they could print the boxes and deliver them in the fastet way possible to meet the deadline. They would handle it. That negotiation got me to cancel my first refund request. At this time boes were not produced. Seller strung me along until they produced the boxes, received final payment (which they said was to arrange shipping) waiting a day (each day was a day waisted and no way the ycould deliver) then came back demanding more money. They essentially 1. blamed me that they "purchased raw materials" which a paper company should already have. and 2. They forced produced the boxes to hold them over my head and force me to take them way beyond the contracted delivery date. The seller assured me my order would be protected by trade assurance. What she really meant was she would be protected. I cancelled the order and have requested a refund. From what I understand others have experiencesd this tactic where the seller follows their own agenda and people are forced to take inferior product and ervice.

review: Good service, on time delivery, and also a nice product

name: CVK
review: I recently encountered several issues with my orders on Alibaba.com, and unfortunately, my overall experience was disappointing.Firstly, I had issues with two of my orders (order numbers 204563062501022443 and 204562838501022443), and despite reaching out to customer service for assistance, the resolution process was slow and ineffective. The communication was lacking, and I felt like my concerns were not being adequately addressed.Additionally, I encountered difficulties with the refund process for a canceled order. Despite canceling the order promptly and not receiving the product, I faced challenges in obtaining a full refund, including the service fee. This lack of transparency and adherence to refund policies was frustrating and unacceptable.Overall, my experience with Alibaba.com left much to be desired. The customer service was lacking, the resolution process was slow, and the refund policies were not properly implemented. As a result, I am hesitant to continue using Alibaba.com for future purchases and would caution others to be aware of these issuesAfter a lot of efforts they finally refund 60 USD transaction fee of cancellation which is 22 USD less but I agree better than nothing

name: Vienessa Goodwin
review: Looking at starting a small stationery business. Created artwork, went onto Alibaba & created an account. Within a couple of days I had found someone who could help me with a small amount of product. Unfortunately, many cater to larger companies & when less than 10 or 100 are ordered, the prices are horrendous (due to printing methods). However I found someone who sent me 5 copies of my product at a reasonable rate. The company was extremely good at communicating & helping me complete my product order. Extremely happy with the results.

review: Good Experience every thing is best, mostly supplier are verified product quality, services and delivery are also best but there is a little issue that the delivery charges is so high then product cost. Most of amazon seller like me want to purchase product through this platform but due to high shipping cost they can't purchase. Please request to shipper that please reduce the shipping charges for small business man like me because we are having minimum budget, and purchase minimum order quantity. they want to purchase through Ali platform but due to high shipping charges they can't purchase please resolve this issue.

review: I always have a decent experience with Alibaba. people try to turn there nose up at Chinese products and factories. but the truth is the majority of things come from china whether you know it or not. only difference is someone has it sitting in a UK warehouse and has re branded it. i have had 1 or 2 not great experiences on Ali express, due to poor stores but that is individual sellers and not the platform itself. my only Gripe is with shipping times, but i guess if your making a business purchase you need to factor time into the equation. after all you are getting it cheaper than you would do if bought from the UK.

Beware that a lot of sellers are not legitimate and you have no protection for your purchases or hard earned money. There are a lot of scammers.

name: pasion comprascr
review: Alibaba does not protect buyers.Case #100022668016Order #199928510501028890The behavior of the Alibaba team that handles disputes is shameful.The seller sent counterfeit Apple watches, the package was blocked in transit and not in my country, the incoterm was DAP, so the seller is responsible until the package arrives in my country, but it never arrived .I produced dozens of evidence, an official UPS document stating that the package was confiscated in transit in the United States, conversations with the seller and his forwarder who said that the products were confiscated in transit because they were counterfeit, furthermore the seller had added a false shipping number, which is also why I produced evidence.But nothing, Alibaba wants to protect the seller at all costs, with superficial, shameful and unacceptable responsesI will delete this review if I will get a full refund, otherwise I will write others and notify Apple and all the authorities of all the countries in which Alibaba has an office.PLEASE PAY ATTENTION

Lena ignored my trade insurance which granted to me a full refund in such a scam (fraud) and right to return the goods. name: Cape Digital Solutions
review: I purchased some electronic sensors through Alibaba thinking that there was some 'trade assurance'. These sensors arrived and did not even nearly meet their advertised specification. Alibab got involved and insisted that they would need to source a testing laboratory to confirm and not the one we offered. After delaying for months here (while we waited fro them), they have simply shut the dispute down giving some ridiculous response that we were not providing proof. We gave all the proof that they allowed.Thruth is, do not for any reason believe that you are going to get any kind of support from Alibaba regarding fraudelant products purchased through their website. They are actually as big a scam as this particular suppplier.

name: Serene kadi
review: I recently purchased soft wall padding for decor from this supplier on Ali Baba, and I couldn't be more pleased. The shipping was remarkably fast, exceeding my expectations. I highly recommend this Ali Baba supplier for their top-notch products, swift shipping, and exceptional customer service.

name: Joan Son
review: I tried to purchase a Massy 75hp tractor with Loader.Seller then changed the price by more than $3,000 and then they tried to offer a different brand (Lovol) stating same tractor.  My Credit Card company thru Paypal cancelled the order as a High Risk and refunded my funds.  Alibaba Trade Assurance is trying to keep Master Card funds as seller stated they started Building Tractor.       I never signed a contract. I am safe but without my CC Protection , I would have lost over $2500.  Fraud case. #1, Trade Assurance does not protect the seller.#2  A bait and switch product, Fraud.#3  Alibaba sides with the seller even though the seller submits different pictures of product that doesn't match with the attempted purchase. A 50hp vs 75hp.#4  Make sure your payment processs is protected against shaddy sellers, especially Alibaba overseas.#5  Buyer, Bewhere !!!!!!!!!!!

name: Renee Wierz
review: This has been a horrendous scam of an experience.  Let me tell you about how Alibaba scammed me...First they fool you with this so called "trade assurance" Don't fall for it.  After placing an order and being told I needed to pay extra to "expedite" which I did the product still never arrived.  I actually still do not have the item and it has been months for "expedited shipping"  That being said Alibaba called me and said rest assured this will be taken care of and you will be refunded this is not a scam, more lies.  The item they shipped is not even the correct colors to what we asked for.  We had asked for a refund initially but instead they said they would ship faster to ensure the item reached us.  At least if you are going to lie send the correct item.  SCAM SCAM SCAM  Alibaba lies about their trade assurance protection.  They stole our money over 1800.00 and allowed the vendor to do that.  DO NOT USE ALIBABA
