name: Venessa Kaffka
review: Supplier was professional, friendly and very quick in answering my questions. Product arrived quickly and no mistakes or delays. Very satisfied and Alibaba made the process easily and safe!

name: Hasini Abeysekera
review: Alibaba is a game-changer when it comes to online marketplaces. Having used the platform for a variety of purposes, I can confidently say that Alibaba has exceeded my expectations in every way.One of the most impressive aspects of Alibaba is its vast and diverse range of products and services. Whether you're a consumer looking for unique items, a business owner searching for suppliers, or an entrepreneur seeking new opportunities, Alibaba has you covered. The platform is a treasure trove of options, with countless sellers offering everything from electronics and fashion to industrial equipment and raw materials. The variety and availability are simply unmatched.Alibaba's commitment to quality and authenticity is evident through its verification and rating systems. It provides a level of confidence that is crucial when making purchases, especially from international sellers. I have found that the majority of the sellers I have interacted with on Alibaba are professional and reliable, delivering on their promises and ensuring customer satisfaction.The user-friendly interface and powerful search tools make navigating the platform a breeze. Whether you're a seasoned Alibaba user or a newcomer, you can easily find what you're looking for, connect with sellers, and make transactions with confidence. The ability to communicate directly with sellers through the platform is a great feature, as it streamlines the buying process and eliminates communication barriers.Alibaba's shipping and logistics solutions are also praiseworthy. The platform offers various shipping options, and I have experienced timely and efficient deliveries. The integration of tracking services ensures you can monitor your orders from start to finish.Furthermore, the wealth of educational resources on Alibaba has been incredibly valuable. Whether you're a seller or a buyer, you can access a wealth of information, tips, and guides to enhance your experience and success on the platform.In conclusion, Alibaba is a top-tier platform that caters to a wide array of needs. It offers a vast selection, assurance of quality, ease of use, reliable communication, and efficient shipping services. I highly recommend Alibaba to anyone looking to buy or sell products, find suppliers, or explore business opportunities. It has earned its reputation as a global leader in the e-commerce industry.

name: David
review: It's COLD!The product: (Z18 Peltier laptop cooler)Tested on a Lenovo 330 (had to place the computer oddly on the side) and on an ASUS TUF Dash. That one's running temperature went down from 55¬∞C to 37¬∞C on average - testing right now with more load and it' still only 41¬∞C - and the fans are not even running (0 RPM both GPU and CPU fans, and it's COLD!) The delivery (Mail Americas):Someone at the last mile delivery courier misplaced my address, so I had to go get it in person and was lucky I did it today - 20 minutes more and it would had been returned. That's why I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5.

review: I recently purchased the DTF powder shaker and dryer from Cindy's company and had an outstanding experience. She was highly responsive, provided valuable insights, and ensured quick and hassle-free shipping. This level of professionalism and dedication is remarkable.I wholeheartedly recommend the DTF powder shaker and dryer from Cindy's company. The product is top-notch, and the customer service is outstanding. Five stars all the way! Thank you, Cindy and team!

review: It was easy to place the order, all the details were provided upfront without too much back and forth. The seller was very prompt and responsive. The product exceeds my expectation. It is not heavy and the colours are a nice light mix. I will definitely reorder from this seller.

name: Spirit Power
review: Be very careful if you are ordering private label products as a new brand, from Alibaba. Please be aware that they are selling the same product you may have purchased for hundreds of pounds same product on Alibaba is selling cheaply on Amazon.Check if the product is highly circulated, and if it‚Äôs on Amazon because as a brand you will not make any profit, so don‚Äôt get ripped off. if you‚Äôre searching for products as a brand make sure they are not on Amazon first, and if you do have an option of choosing a different tube and different box that will be more beneficial for you. I feel that buying some of the products on Alibaba are highly circulated will just kill your business and some of them are riff offs of other brands, such as huda and Esther Lauder. Extremely disappointing!

review: I ordered ribbons from Huzhou Double Qing Clothing Accessory Co. through Alibaba and had a positive experience. Sent via FedEx, the package arrived quicker than expected, with the ribbons well-packed and in perfect condition.In short, I had a great experience with Huzhou Double Qing Clothing Accessory Co. on Alibaba. If you need quality ribbons and appreciate good service, I recommend them. They've earned my trust and future business.

review: Im Found the product, but price are very high. Writing about some things are not professionel and not helpfull. But this is more the service. About the Quality is the middle, about 80% of the products im not pleased. Very oft the Quality is lacking.

name: Marce Tabares Herrera
review: I make regular purchases from alibaba, and I will continue to make them. However, I think the service could be improved, by evaluating their supplier database more in depth. I've had different experiences with different suppliers. Good and bad. I can say you have to be a relative experienced purchaser to know what to ask for the supplier. Since Chinese providers don't always come clean about all information, do not go just with price and photos. Ask all the questions you think are relevant to your purchase. And even doing so you can receive some products that are not what you expected. Having said that, I have also found good suppliers, and received also very good equipment, friendly people and they also agree to take photos and videos before you pay the amount due (if you negotiated 50-50, 30-70%)So I would look at the years of supplier on alibaba, the reviews, the market, the volume of sells, etc. Hopefully this review helps you.

review: There was one order and it was more than 1 month those products were 10% usable but Ali Baba didn't support this only report was handling the chat but no resolution was there, disappointed a lot.

review: Very good Company and very good product. I am very satisfied with this company and product, i strongly recommend other people to buy from this company. Only think is, that i wish to delivery quicker, but i think that is not the fault from Tewaycell, i think this is the fault from the delivery company. I would buy again from Tewaycell (Shenzhen Topway New Energy), every time. Thank you so much, for this beautiful Lithium-batteries.

review: I have bought many different products from this trading platform and have not yet been disappointed

name: S. Borjigin
review: Alibaba.com is a wild west. Anything goes. Fake sellers, fake products, fake services. You name it. The fake sellers will lure unsuspecting customers into paying for their fake products or services and then exploiting them for more money. I was scammed $1770 by a fake seller on alibaba.com who is registered as 316 Business Ventures LLC under a fake agent by the name of Marcella Smith. They have a bank account with TD Bank under the name Shavonne Parson. After realizing I was scammed and I will never receive the fake product I paid for, I filed a complaint about the fake seller on alibaba.com, their customer service began to ask the same questions over and over again and to demand the same evidence multiple times. Basically, someone committed a crime on their website, they should take it a lot more seriously than what they are doing. All they have done is to delay, find more excuses, and do nothing while the criminals are scamming on their website to harm more unsuspecting customers. They can do better or else they should not be doing business in any western countries.Rest assured I will NEVER EVER shop with Alibaba.com in my lifetime, and I will share my experience on their website to everyone I know about how they have no guardrail, no protection of their customers, no vetting of their registered sellers many of whom are scammers. Do better Alibaba.

review: Since beginning I want to order a set of fender flares for 2 doors toyota landcruiser mark II model 1985 from Mr. Dragon Su of Guangdong Ulon Cross-Border Supply Chain Co Ltd and I ask him whether his product can be fit or not initially I send him the his photos and details from his post in the message center. After order from him, he delivered me the fender flares for 4 doors Toyota Landcruiser Mark II model 1985 one. I ask him why he send me the wrong item. He told me he thought I want 4 doors one but I have point out to him our conversation from beginning to end I only ask for 2 doors one and I never tell him I want the fender flares for 4 doors one. He blame me on the photo I send him the photo of his which posted on alibaba.com which he alleged is for 4 doors toyota landcruiser mark II? As I said earlier I contact him by looking at a photo and details he posted and I ask him whether the fender flares can fit for 2 doors one or not and he told me is suitable. In the end he just said he very busy and have many order and he thought I want a 4 doors one and he so ridiculous accuse me on a photo which he posted himself which I ask him in the beginning can the fender flares he posted for sales fit for the 2 doors one toyota landcruiser mark II model 1985 !!! I am so disappointed to this unreasonable seller and I feel not safe if I ever encounter another seller like this who just want to sell or clear their stock not following to what customer wants to buy !!!

name: Sebastian Petrescu
review: Dont buy from aliexpress or alibaba, china especially, you will receive items that will last hopefully until those 15 days of disputes expires. Then you will see the quality of those items. In my case electronics got broken in 6-12 months, plastic chromes, got broken in 7 months, anything bought from there is at a very low quality. Support is useless, never refund money, also communication with sellers when your items start getting bad is useless because they block you not to send messages anymore.Avoid this scam market at any cost, buy original things, even if it s x3 x4 expensive.Other example, i bought a pair of headlights, 800 usd, they sent wrong headlights, they offered me 50 usd refund, i paid 400 usd more to fix the wrong headlights, after 1 year, signal light got broken snd position light startrd getting low intensity.

review: I am delighted to express my sincere appreciation for the Alibaba platform. review: I always receive great products when ordering from Alibaba! Sometimes its hard to understand how to pay the taxes though.

name: customer
review: This is a good example of how good customer service can build up trust. I chose products from the "ready to ship" category and had already paid for the order, when the attendant noticed that the shipment price was too low (apparently the platform did not account for the added cost of lithium battery shipment). I was quite unhappy about it, and fully expected to just give up the order because the price of the shipment would have been higher that I deemed acceptable, when the sales representative apologized and offered to share the added cost. Although I did pay a little more than I expected, being treated respectfully convinced me to proceed with the purchase. The products arrived very quickly, and in excellent condition.

name: Andrea
review: My experience with Shenzhen Fendy Cosmetics Co., Ltd  was incredibly professional. I'm thrilled with the products I received ‚Äì the eyeshadows are velvety smooth, wonderfully creamy, and exceptionally stunning with their high pigmentation. I've crafted stunning makeup looks using these products. I wholeheartedly endorse this company and will certainly place another order, likely a larger one. The impeccable professionalism, friendliness, and swift shipping have won me over.  Also working with my representative, Suzy, was an exceptionally professional and pleasant experience. She provided valuable assistance with my order and executed the process adeptly.excellent service will do business again.

review: Bad quality. Watch full of scratches on the back of the lugs. But what's worse is that the seller refused to take it back and refund me the $800 I paid, despite the fact that with several videos I proved to him that the watch was also broken. Broken because the chronograph doesn't work. He even had the audacity to answer me that this failure did not compromise the functionality of the watch. As if a broken chronograph were the same as a perfectly functional chronograph. Without words! Do not buy from this seller as he is totally unreliable. The behavior of Alibaba is also serious, which with excuses and pretexts refused to apply the Trade Assurance Order, which was also envisaged for this product. My experience on Alibaba ends here because it is a platform that does not keep what it promises when buying a product.

Otherwise, Alibaba platform has been kind to me and I will continue using for years to come.  I will update this review accordingly once the situation I'm resolving is sorted out.

name: M W Mike
review: I have had a terrible experience using this company. It's honestly the first time I have ever bought something online and been treated this poorly. I saw these phones on their site that are all claiming to be Samsung s23s or the iPhone equivalent for very cheap prices. I figured their knock offs but with similar capabilities, so decided to order one for me and my father. All over their site they have these phones listed this way. I ordered 2 phones and as soon as they arrived and I checked out the phones I realized these phones are absolutely terrible. It claimed to have a fast core and alot of memory, but it was terribly slow and just a bad product. So I think, ok fine I'll just return them. I've never used alibaba before, and I'm thinking this should be a fairly simple refund process but nooooo...Turns out the way they process returns is much different than what you would experience on Amazon or almost any online market space. They give the seller time to protest, and if they don't I guess they just refund the money.Sure enough the seller says that they messaged me saying they are actually cheap Chinese phones, which of course I never saw the message since its a message on the website and not like an email. I wasn't aware of any messaging on the site. So this is the message they sent.This is our China, domestic smart Android phone, which is cost-effective and easy to use. It is not Samsung/Apple phone. We will send you the real picture of the product for confirmation before shipment. If you agree to need this Android phone, please reply yes, and we will deliver the product for you. If you don't want this Android, please reply No, thank youWhich I never said Yes to since I never saw it. Which even though I never said yes, they sent them anyway. This whole process is absurd, all I want to do is return the phones and have my money refunded.So after that they have the option to "escalate" so alibaba can decide if they can do anything. Which they make you submit "evidence" to back up your claim. I took a screenshot that clearly shows they are saying they're selling phones that are s23s. Which they aren't. And this is the RIDICULOUS response they gave me.Dear Michael Wills, Good day! This is Sherry from Alibaba. This email is for your trade assurance order 180861763001022377. For the dispute that you request refund, we have carefully reviewed all the evidence you submit, and did our best to discuss solutions with the seller. But they refused to provide more solutions. Although we hope to support you to obtain the refund, we found that you would clearly notice the products are counterfeit before decide to buy them. According to Alibaba Trade Assurance rules and policies, Counterfeit Products are highly risky products which are not allowed to transact on Alibaba.com.That you purchase fake products on purpose is prohibited by Alibaba and we will not protect such transactions. Therefore, this transaction dispute will be closed soon. You should reach out to sellers for refund directly. I hope to hear from you! Your kind patience and understanding will be highly appreciated. Sincerely, Sherry Trade Dispute Mediation DepartmentSo they're saying it's my fault I'm not getting a refund because I should have noticed it was counterfeit, and that counterfeit devices are prohibited?!!!YOU HAVE COUNTERFEIT STUFF ALL THROUGHOUT YOUR SITE!!! THATS BASICALLY ALL THEY SELL!!!If its "prohibited" then why is that being sold all over the site? So they put me through this terrible hassle that's dragged on for almost 2 weeks now, with all this haggling and being forced to write long messages over and over, all for what any other company would just do for me without ANY of this BS!I consider the seller to be an obvious scammer that is well aware of the angle of the scam, and the site to be enabling them and essentially favoring them in a very biased way, over the customer.ALL I WANTED WAS A SIMPLE REFUND its only 117$Imagine if you actually spent alot of money and they act this way over refunds and sell really sketchy stuff.

review: I am extremely pleased with my experience as a reseller on Alibaba. name: Julio P√©rez Cabrera
review: I recently had the opportunity to explore Alibaba as a platform for sourcing suppliers from China, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations in every way. Alibaba has truly established itself as the go-to platform for businesses looking to connect with suppliers and secure the best prices in the market. Here's why I believe Alibaba is the best platform for this purpose.Vast Supplier Network: Alibaba boasts an extensive network of suppliers, encompassing a wide range of industries and products. Whether you're looking for electronics, clothing, machinery, or any other type of product, you'll find countless suppliers on Alibaba willing to cater to your needs. The platform's vast supplier database ensures that you can explore multiple options and choose the one that best suits your requirements.Competitive Pricing: One of the biggest advantages of Alibaba is the ability to find suppliers offering the best prices in the market. The platform facilitates direct communication with suppliers, allowing you to negotiate and strike the most competitive deals. This price advantage is particularly beneficial for businesses looking to maximize their profit margins or those operating on a tight budget.Trade Assurance: Alibaba's Trade Assurance feature is a game-changer when it comes to ensuring a secure and trustworthy transaction. With Trade Assurance, buyers are protected against supplier fraud or misrepresentation. The feature provides a safety net by offering full or partial refunds if the products received do not meet the agreed-upon specifications or if the shipment is delayed. This level of assurance adds peace of mind and significantly reduces the risks associated with international trade.Supplier Verification: Alibaba takes supplier verification seriously, which is crucial when dealing with overseas suppliers. The platform offers various verification badges and certifications that indicate a supplier's reliability, such as Gold Supplier, Onsite Check, and Assessed Supplier. These verification measures help in building trust and confidence in the suppliers you choose to work with.Communication Tools: Alibaba provides an array of communication tools that simplify the process of contacting and collaborating with suppliers. The platform's messaging system allows for seamless communication, enabling you to discuss product details, negotiate prices, and address any concerns directly with the suppliers. This streamlined communication process saves time and eliminates potential misunderstandings.In conclusion, Alibaba is undoubtedly the best platform for connecting with suppliers from China and securing the best prices in the market. Its vast supplier network, competitive pricing, and robust Trade Assurance feature make it an ideal choice for businesses of all sizes. The platform's emphasis on supplier verification and efficient communication tools further enhance the overall experience. Whether you're a small business owner or a large corporation, Alibaba provides the resources and security needed to establish fruitful relationships with Chinese suppliers. I highly recommend Alibaba for anyone looking to source products from China.

What's more, they continue to take you for a fool!To see how an ad is written, all you have to do is visit the Alibaba website !!!Liar and manipulator.It's supposedly saved but it's not. You'll have to start all over again.It's a shame to lie and take people for fools.If Alibaba can only sell these services by lying, how can you trust them?

name: Serkan yƒ±ldƒ±z
review: MUST ACCEPT THAT YOU HAVE ZERO PROTECTIONWe ordered a product that was customized and made 30% initial payment around $9k. Supplier admitted after 30-40 days (weeks after the expected ship time) they are unable to make what we needed. We asked refund no response. Checkout completed on Alibaba and we followed the direction on their website. Paid the exact amount. I have the proof of payment and they also confirmed the payment. Everything is on the chat history for Alibaba to confirm. I don't think there could be any case that would be more clear and easier to refund than this. Alibaba says we need to ask refund from supplier which is not refunding. If Alibaba is not helping with this scenario where you pay as instructed and supplier admits they won't do it, not sure what is the point of placing an order on Alibaba. That being said, you have no protection at all with Alibaba. You can use any Chinese website or work directly with suppliers and you will have the same protection.

review: Alibaba has its ups and downs. they use US dollar which is annoying as between the 3 different countries, the currency exchange is forever changing and they do not alter the prices well. tracking product in transit is poor as they do not have integration to link theirs to Alibaba's tracking details, so, you have to rely on Alibaba Trade assurance if the seller doesn't send you the products. it confirms reciept saying the item has been shipped and you cannot contest it on alibaba. it only extends it. the items you see on a page are not the products they actually sell. so the image you enquire about on their page is a bit of click bait and you have to start the design phase from the very beginning. Alibaba is very behind in customer experience

review: My first time shopping from AlibabaI have over 100+ purchases from AliexpressMy product reached me with no problemIf I didn't receive my product, I don't think there would be a problem in the dispute since it belongs to Aliexpress.If it says that you can buy a maximum of 10 products on the products, in the description; Contact Seller creates order for youPlease note that in some countries, there is a limit to one-time shopping for personal purchases due to the fact that the product is sold for commercial purposes.Therefore, be aware of the laws of our country when shopping, or customs will confiscate the product.For example, the limit is 4 in Turkey.Good Day

The company profile has all the incorrect addresses.You can't request or make it clear about your order before it ships from the seller.I have all communication proof from the seller and Alibaba.I can't see how to attach these proof details here, but I will try to post them in other places, and I will create a YouTube video to alert all Aliba new buyers.Alibaba silently supports sellers, not buyers. Alibaba ignored its own trade assurance policy to make sellers happy because sellers pay more than buyers.  I have found Trade Assurance to be greedy for buyers only.I will explain this in detail in my upcoming video, including how to protect yourself and where and how to buy Chinese products.The video title would be not sure 100% now = Trade Assurance with Alibaba does not exist in reality, and customer service works like a poppet.

review: I bought an Ezrevo robotic mower from Alibaba Supplier Mark Li. I never received the product and since last July 2022 he has not refunded me the 472 euro. Last month he said only 300 euro refund and now he is saying 100 euro and that I didn't send back the shipping agent details which I did numerous times. Do not do business with Mark Li

name: Shashank Shrivastava
review: This was my first experience ordering from Alibaba. I had many doubts about the payment and quality. But the supplier was very helpful and answered all my doubts. Communicated with me frequently to answer all queries. Shared images before dispatch. The order was delivered on time. The quality was good as expected.The collection of products of Alibaba is endless, you wish for something and you will find it there. Do your due diligence about manufacturer and make payments inside Alibaba to avoid fraud and you are good to go.The only issue I faced was that, I prepaid the order and shipping cost to the supplier still I was charged the extra amount in the form of customs duty and service charge, of which I was not aware. I was expecting that it will be included in the shipping fee, as the supplier confirmed the same. Seems the supplier was also not aware of the charges, so I would advise checking about the charges in the form of customs duty and service charges at your destination port as they are not included in the payment you will make to the supplier on Alibaba. But the supplier cooperated with me in investigating the extra charges. In the end, the product quality was good and communication with the supplier was very smooth. Hence the extra price is acceptable. I would recommend Alibaba for your business or personal use purchases.

name: Rose Maglente
review: I'm satisfied, the product I ordered was of good quality. Karla Liu was helpful throughout the process. The issue I had was from the shipping company, but overall it was a great expirience.I recommend them.

review: The great thing was that I had never placed an order like this in China and was well looked after from the first contact. review: Service was efficient and professional.  Delivery arrived ahead of time and the product was great quality and exactly as we ordered.

name: Jacquelyn
review: I use Alibaba to source a wide variety of products for my business and personal use. It can be tricky to figure out which suppliers are better than others. Some have really great pricing and are willing to make you happy while others can have attitude and be kind of rude. Usually there are no problems and I get my orders within the estimated time frame if not sooner. Don't be afraid to message several suppliers asking their pricing and turnaround time to compare.

name: saher Am
review: WARN WARN WARNi bought products 14000$,i didnt receive any thing of the goods,i opened dispute and alibaba ask for proofs and evidence,i put all proofs and evidence,nothing happened,ALIBABA platform protect the seller scammers and not the buyers,i made order on NOV 2020 and till now i didnt get my money back.DO NOT order with alibaba Platform!

name: Ramesh Kumar Sharma
review: All product you need is hear.

name: Joy Perrotty
review: Easy to order. The delivery date is faster.  The products are beautiful

name: Robert Brown
review: As far as connecting with suppliers, communicating and ordering, Alibaba is user friendly. The problem is, as a US buyer, you have little to no protection against dishonest suppliers. You are really at the mercy of the suppliers to be honest and provide a good product. Alibaba's "Trade Assurance" program only applies to approved Chinese sellers, not other countries. And Trade Assurance is designed to favor the suppliers and in many cases, block complaints from buyers. We have lost several thousand dollars due to unscrupulous suppliers on Alibaba; as a small business foreign buyer, I recommend avoiding Alibaba.

name: Deena
review: Super reliable seller, excellent product condition and fast delivery. It was like buying on amazon or any other type of local service. Im very impressed. (Delivered to Toronto Canada)

Thanks to this, we were confident in the quality of the products and confident that our order was being produced with the utmost care.The Zhe Fan jewelry team is friendly and professional. We can appreciate this based on our daily communications with international companies, which range from 10 to 50 per day. We strongly recommend Zhe Fan jewelry with a rating of 10 points, and would like to separately note the professionalism of Nora Chen, who was very helpful in communicating with the team. name: Carl Whitelaw
review: I needed a little larger quantity of product (not a huge quantity)for some custom craft work. Alibaba was able to connect me to a manufacturer that was willing to provide the product and quantity I needed. The pricing was straight forward. With shipping, taxes  and any duties included, I was still able to save quite a bit over the resellers. The monitor is lightweight and compact, easy to carry wherever you want. The protective case provided allows you to travel with the monitor without worrying about any damage during transport.The connection technology is equally impressive: you can connect the monitor to a laptop or another device via HDMI or USB-C cable. This way, you can use the portable monitor as a second screen and work on two screens simultaneously efficiently.In summary, if you are looking for a high-quality portable monitor, I highly recommend the model. With its amazing image quality and convenience of the product, it is an excellent choice for those who are looking for a portable monitor for work or entertainment."

name: Janine Scotty
review: Alibaba needs to be shut down, I spent months with my supplier explaining what I needed, sent pictures was very clear from the start.  After months of making sure they understood what I wanted to went ahead paid a 50% deposit, the seller dragged me on for 5 months, so they said it would take 5 days, it took 5 months, at first the company rep kept saying it's in production, for 3 weeks, then when i questioned it, they kept sending me 3d renderings, but it never was what I requested.  Then when I went to cancel my order, they told me I needed to pay 180 USD for the designs, I explained the designs were always incorrect, So I didnt want to pay the fee. Escalated the case send in my chat history as evidence of things that were agreed upon but never delivered.  Alibaba agreed with the seller and took my entire 50% deposit for products I have never even received.  This is disturbing and very dishonest

review: I recently had the pleasure of using Alibaba.com for my business needs, and I couldn't be happier with the experience. The platform is incredibly user-friendly, and I was able to easily find and connect with suppliers who offered the products I needed at competitive prices.One of the features I particularly liked was the ability to filter search results by various criteria, such as product category, supplier type, and location. This made it easy to narrow down my options and find the best suppliers for my needs.I also appreciated the level of transparency and communication throughout the process. The suppliers I worked with were responsive and provided detailed information about their products and services, which gave me confidence in my purchasing decisions.Overall, I would highly recommend Alibaba.com to anyone in need of quality products and reliable suppliers. The platform is a great resource for businesses of all sizes, and I will definitely be using it again in the future.

As I reached out to the seller who sold the product via Alibaba, wasn't communicable; I received one email apologizing for the delay, because it was their Chinese New Year (which must be a week or so long). Long story short - I have a non-functional product, with no remote and not 2 as I paid for. I have to file dispute cases all over the place and still I am out of $291.32. I will not do business with this company again, if I can help it.

review: Products quality is good even though they sent me different types of products.Thank you.

name: D√°maris Morales
review: If you proceed placing an order with one of their sellers you will have to outsmart them, you will need everything in the quotation. Every little detail, that you would think, "this goes without saying", NO. It needs saying, like I want the stitching straight on my product, yes, you will have to discuss basic things with the seller. Check every little detail of your order, ask for everything to be added on the quotation, any special requirement you have, put it in writing. Because of course it will arrive wrong, duh. But at least the alibaba dispute team won't refute your case using that excuse. You asked for something, you put in in writing, then maybe they will refund your money if needed. I ordered using their platform, even though I did not receive a quality product and there were missing details I requested, they won't fix it or give me a refund. There can be stains, it can be broken, and it can be really really cheap, they won't assume any responsibility or fix the issue for you. PUT EVERYTHING IN WRITING if you still think its worth it.

name: Jeff
review: I have been around or in business my entire life and deal with wholesale all the time.  I also purchase almost daily through numerous platforms.  Signed up for a first time account and was immediately suspended.  Alibaba platform wouldn't work on my everyday computer so I tried another one in the same office which didn't work either.  Apparently this triggered an automatic suspension for suspicious activity.  Took me several hours with customer service bots, that claimed they were human, to get reinstated.  Then reached out to a supplier(don't know if they were an actual manufacturer or distributor because Alibaba doesn't do a good job of differentiating) for clarification on their shipping charges.  They included a hefty shipping charge with no explanation what it was for.  After doing research it appears I need to pay for additional expensive shipping, a freight forwarder and a customs broker in order to purchase cheap chinese junk from a chinese manufacturer that won't even respond to my questions.  I still have no idea if the numerous messages I sent were actually sent or read because I can't find any messages sent or received through my account.  I must be missing something.  How does anybody use this platform to purchase anything?  In addition, after paying all the middle people either marking up or taking a direct payment from me, how does anybody save money or make a profit?  What is the point of working directly with a manufacturer if multiple people, businesses or governments still take a cut in order to receive your products?  It appears to be an expensive, complicated and time consuming process.  You might as well pay a little more retail and skip all the BS and save lots of time.  Time is money and I wasted a lot of time.  Closed account and moved on.  Alibaba is a bad joke.

review: We bought preserved flowers from a supplier via Alibaba. We received the products and the quality of the products was not as per the photos and videos the supplier had sent us. It was so poor that we can't even sell the flowers to customers. We tried going through the trade assurance, demanding a $16,800USD refund (which is approximately 50% of the total amount we paid), however after uploading more than enough photos and videos, and writing lengthy explanations, Alibaba's trade assurance team suggested a $400USD credit instead. This was absolutely appalling and explained that they thought the products were sent out good quality and was instead damaged during shipment. It was impossible that the product was damaged during shipment as the goods were hand packaged and hand tied so that the flowers were damaged and unusable. Alibaba is a waste of time and money, and would never deal with them again.

In the end they pressured me to take a partial refund and keep the products which I couldn't use.My experience with Aliaba : 1 - Trade Assurance is not working ! 2 - Suppliers will never take responsibility for their mistakes and they do everything they can to make you keep the product you are not happy with.

I asked for a refund as I paid with Trade Insurace by Alibaba. They decided to refund $0 and closed the case. Lost $780. I used Amazon instead buying one sample (same specs of the product) for same price   including free shipping. Received it 3 days later. My best advise is that you look at Amazon first. And if use Alibaba don't use Trade Insurance (no protection against fraud at all).

name: sel pino
review: I purchased thin film solar panels . I thought I was buying it safely from the supplier, making sure the products are certified and descriptions are what they should be. This site is merely an advertising board for Chinese manufacturers. The prices indicated are fake and misleading and the shipping cost is the same way. Basically, you send money to a foreign manufacturer taking a big chance. I lost Ovber $5,000. The product was shipped to Turkey, but the descriptuions were wrong, the certificates for fake, it didnt match the product. The labels should have had international standards  CE certificates , manufacturers name, date of manufacturing, model number should have matched the CE certificate. The goods were rejected by the customs due to improper and fake documents. I made a complaint to Alibaba. Guess what, they were sided with the dodgy supplier not me.  There is hardly any information about the product itself, especially specifications.In my opinion, this is a big waste of time and a high risk gamble, and dishonest Alibaba organisation behind it all. I will never buy anything through Alibaba. I also found an alternative supplier in Singapore. I found them a bit more expensive but honest. My recommendation is don't use Alibaba. Everything is OK until something goes wrong. How Alibaba can be sided with dishonest supplier I never know.

name: Michelle Adams
review: Received three broken items. The representative said she would credit me for those items on my next order, so I went ahead and ordered two additional cases of different products. Only after I paid, she told me that I did not get the credit because I ordered items that were on sale. She offered to refund the three broken items via PayPal, but I do not use PayPal. She then told me that I could file a dispute if I wanted to. They were aware that there was a problem. I only ordered again because a refund was offered as a credit on my next purchase. Otherwise, I would have waited to see if a different resolution was offered and fulfilled before trusting the company again. Instead, I will not be purchasing from "May Cherry C" again.I value honesty above all else. When she offered a credit on my next purchase for cost of the three broken items, she should have kept her promise. I don't like to write bad reviews.

review: This site is merely an advertising board for Chinese manufacturers. The prices indicated are fake and misleading and the shipping cost is the same way. Basically, you send money to a foreign manufacturer taking a big chance.There is hardly any information about the product itself, especially specifications.The ad contains multiple configurations for the item but you cannot select any specific one.In my opinion, this is a big waste of time and a high risk gamble.

And they also stole our personal goods and sold them to other customers as they were delivered in the same container with their goods. but sunport 350 watt A grade and a data sheet were provided, (the specification was sent above) the company can also act under another name STARWORLD ELECTRONICS (HK) CO., LTD with registration in Hong Kong, they did all this against the backdrop of a difficult situation in Ukraine against the background war. We ask for the help of professional lawyers to punish scammers.

name: Caitlin

name: PliSsK
review: When it comes to buying goods on Alibaba, I would always recommend paying by means where you have buyer's protection, such as a credit card, rather than bank transfer, as it may be slightly more expensive, but you cannot rely on Alibaba's Dispute Team to mediate in a fair manner nor on the seller to honour their warranty. Thus if you have issues you can claim the amount due back on your credit card, e.g. where the product arrives damaged. Alibaba don't care about customers and only seek to serve the sellers' interests with their 'procedures' are just there to make you feel like your rights are protected when in reality they don't follow their own procedures and do whatever they like.I bought a product worth ¬£2000 on Alibaba. The seller could hardly speak any English. The seller sent me hundreds of messages as part of a hard sell, and phoned me up, it was quite wearing, yet did not answer half my questions. The specification of the item was unclear and I asked for certain features and they did not deliver them. The products were packaged poorly and with items loose or unprotected inside the box and both boxes arrived damaged as they were heavy. The most expensive item arrived with a dent down one side and the seller refused to reimburse me despite the shipping being insured. They did begrudgingly send me a few small replace parts for the stand. The seller lied on several occasions, including claiming that they had raised a claim through UPS which they never did, and claiming that they were going to provide a partial refund via paypal which they never did. I believe this was a delaying tactic to stop me raising a new dispute through Alibaba.I raised two separate cases with the dispute team, the first of which was within their time limit, under the Trade Assurance Agreement (30 days after delivery of goods). The seller fobbed me off and Alibaba offered me a nominal amount but when I pointed out that the seller had given me incorrect information (lied) and that I wanted Alibaba to clarify the two options they were offering me, submitting an email showing the seller had lied about their claim with UPS (and was advised by Alibaba customer services to submit it to the case and it would be reviewed). The dispute team did not read my last response and despite the case still being within the time limit for accepting an offer, they closed the case with no refund. I complained many times to customer service and to the dispute team but the dispute team responded with generic irrelevant responses and declined to communicate otherwise and to acknowledge any of the facts about the case and the purchase (including screenshots of my conversation with customer sevices advising me to submit the last piece of evidence), at first pretending that there was no case, then that I did not raise it in time, and finally that I did not dispute the case result within the allowed time limit, which I did multiple times. Customer services were basically totally useless.I raised a new case which was a warranty claim, for the same issues, and after submitting all required evidence, they asked me to submit numerous other pieces of evidence, which they did not look at, and the seller again fobbed me off refusing any refund or remedial action for warranty issues. Finally Alibaba offered me a partial refund less than the previous time. I asked them to explain it and instead of them reviewing it or answering, the same thing happened again, they closed the case with no refund. Why would I want no refund? Customer services advised that I could 'negotiate' with the dispute team and they did the same thing, refusing to acknowledge any facts and making false claims and fobbing me off and ignoring me.So I would never buy anything from Alibaba again and the company is criminal. I tried to complain to the Chinese Consumer Association about them but they never responded.

name: Lee

You are buying alot of time fictional products. They show pictures that look amazing. Yet went  you get them, they are cheap and don't work. Alibaba won't support the buyer. review: I did my first transaction and it worked out very well,. I received what I ordered when they said it would arrive and am looking for more products to buy.5 stars

We had a terrible experience with custom products that were ordered through Alibaba. Initially, the product samples that were ordered were perfect quality, so we placed a large order. The quality of the product was terrible, and were nothing like the samples. There were multiple obvious construction flaws, resulting in the having to throw out the product. More importantly, when we submitted a dispute with Alibaba, which included multiple photos as evidence of the bad construction, Alibaba ruled in favor of the manufacture and refused to give us a refund for any of the poorly constructed products. Their "trade assurance" is horrible and we lost all our money. Be sure to check each company profile, check years of experience, and read ALL reviews very carefully before ordering.

review: I ordered from a supplier who was nice, but failed to inform me the amount of money I would have to spend on shipping prior to going through with the transaction. I had already paid over $100+ for shipping thinking that it would cover everything, regarding to how much I have paid. Now that the products have arrived to the UK, I am now being told that I would have to pay over ¬£50+ again for tax/ import shipping so now I contact the supplier and she is saying that there is nothing they could do about it. I have now processed a refund and hopefully it will be accepted - very upset at the service. This is my first time buying from alibaba and prior to buying the supplier said that all my goods are insured and I could ask for a refund if anything happens. Now that this is happening and I am no longer in the mood to pay for anything else, they have turned around and said that the products will stay at customs and either be destroyed or returned and nothing will be done about it. Wow. Shocked. Will never purchase from this website and company again! I‚Äôm giving 2 stars and not one only because the supplier woman was kinda friendly.

review: I was sold almost $12,500 worth of highly shoddy product. I do not know how this product passed my private inspectors, but once it arrived in Amazon, it became apparent that it wasn't up to standard. Amazon has shut down my store and I'm left with having to pay for over 1300 units (my original order was 2000) of unsellable merchandise for them to destroy. I recommend not throwing your money away to this company.

name: Michael Higgins
review: I spent a lot of time and money developing an idea with this company. agreeing with them on warranties , spare parts , service manuals and more. Westinman on its website which I found on Alibaba and as a result felt they were trustworthy , Westinman  looks like a  very big operation on its website. My opinion is it's a backyard operation run by a thug.I bought my first container of generators --they arrived in the chosen colour but on examination did not conform to CE in Europe , even though they had a CE cert supplied.I have them expertly modified at my own expense & then tested under load--in one case we had a mechanical problem.This was when the fun began , that was last November, it took until February to get the parts I needed & even then I had to pay for them--this was in spite of sending the necessary proofs. The parts arrived but not as ordered. The guy I was dealing with Moss could not understand anything he did not want to hear.In my business dealings I never had so much hassle , rudeness, downright negativity and poor or non existent service.I want to warn anyone contemplating dealing with this company to either desist or be very careful indeed. Moss is very friendly & happy to take you money--he has no intention of honoring his given warranties & will suddenly not understand english spoken or written when it does not suit him. Be very careful.It would appear Moss has no personal expertise in anything except invoicing. He relies on " engineers" to answer technical questions .Even a simple rocker cover gasket request has to be advised by an " engineer" supported by pictures of said rocker gasket , in spite of supplying the part number and page number from the parts manual.Its clear Moss is a first class chancer with no interest in anything but taking the money. He will not support the product he sells and will resist all efforts to get anything under warranty.I thing you should change your review on this company on your website as its misleading

name: Raphael
review: Easy to navigate site.Lots of information on products and suppliers in order to make choices.

name: Ahsan khaliq
review: product quality excellent and suppler support very friendly and helpful, not install yet. but over all great product. only courier service received extra money ($37.59) the name of taxes.

name: Bloodmoney WarCommander
review: Bought 300$ worth of a product and it got seized by customs for the seller counterfeiting products . I had no way of knowing it was counterfeit. Took 4 months to get a refund through alibaba dispute process and only got 145$ back and had to cover the refund processing fee. Don't use this site unless you have lawyers on retainer to get your money back after they scam you. And you still might not get anything back. They got me for over 140$ and I got nothing for it.

name: Brian Craddock
review: I wrote a review on here last year about how bad my experience was, I thought I was going to have to change my review because Alibaba reached out to me.  They reviewed my case and said they would refund my money after I applied for the refund again.  I applied for the refund and they rejected my refund.  When my supplier never shipped my product, I put in for a refund, they supplier never responded and so they started the time over again for the supplier to respond.  They did this a number of times, it took them about a year to finally approve my refund.  Through that year I changed banks from which i originally paid so they said they would not be able to refund me.  After going through back and forth they finally agreed to refund me if I put the refund application back in, which I did and of course the supplier resurfaces and simply said "it has been two years since this order was placed" that was enough for them to reject my refund, no evidence of shipping any product or anything....completely stole $4000, and alibaba has done nothing.

name: Rebekah
review: Very professional sales representative and supplier. The products were high quality and the shipping came quicker than the estimated time of arrival.

name: Mike Brown
review: Ordered, product delivered to my front porch in about 2 weeks with no problems.

name: Carlos Garza
review: Excellent product, rigid and flexible at the same time and soft to the touch. It was worth every penny

name: Ellis Cowart
review: The products was very good the only thing that was different was the sizes was off compare to american sizes. The sizes were smaller by two sizes. I received the shipment on time. I loved the coats but there were no batteries for the coats nor any information on how to buy or order the batteries.Ellis

name: Jamie
review: We got what we order in time and the quality of the product that we order was as expected

name: Rus Kellar
review: If I could give less than a one I would give a negative 20!!!!  This is the worst e-purchase I have ever made.  I never received my product.  I was told I had to contact the post office.  The company supplied me with the number.  So I called and it was an automated tracking system for the USPS stating that they never received the package.  So, not sure how they didn‚Äôt know that.  I went to the USPS web site to print proof that I never received the package and uploaded as proof.  I have been dealing with this for four weeks and I still haven‚Äôt received a refund. Since when is it the customer responsibility to prove they didn‚Äôt receive a package?   DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!! Ps.  I‚Äôm glad I sold my stock in the horrible company...

name: Oplam Laming
review: Jinan Haorui Biotechnology Co., Ltd. I am glad that I found this company. Very friendly, always ready to help - a professional seller miss Nina. Now I know where I need to go next time. When I use the product, I will give feedback. Thank you very much, Nina.

name: Jose
review: was very easy to find supplier and the products arrive on time and love the payment options!

name: Cong Liu
review: Very good products. purchase really often. They have those best product with good price and very very nice service. highly recommend

name: B-good Honnes
review: We can supply We need to procure below products:1. Protective Mask1-1 Protective Mask For Medical UseMeet China GB19083-2010 standard1-2. General Protective Mask Without Breathing Valve i. N95/N99 Masksii. FFP2/FFP3 Masks;iii. KN95 Mask  2. Surgical MaskMeet YY 0469-2011 standard 3. Disposable Medical Protective SuitsMeet China GB19082-2009 standard Qualification Requirement from Exporter:-Medical Equipment;-Documented Files of the Products;-Quality & Safety Commitment;(download the template here)-Brand Licensing. Payment Method: To be NegotiatedShipping: FCA Loading AirportCumhuriyet, Karayel Sk. No:14, 41420 √áayirova/Kocaeli

name: Jack Olantern
review: I was sold a totally counterfeit doll and Alibaba did next to nothing to resolve the matter. All they did was keep demanding the same proof that the company took photos from another vendor and then pretended to sell the same product for a lower price. The product I received was a piece of junk that was poorly made with toxic chemicals including an oil that came out of the skin, it stunk, it was smaller in measurements, it was not at all as was pictured and had a different face. You get what you pay for and are making a big gamble when ordering anything from Alibaba, who is in the business to make money from the massive amount of counterfeiting coming out of China.

name: T abrahams
review: after purchasing items via alibaba.com with there trade assurance.we received the items and found changes on the PCB.we logged a dispute and awaited response.the suppliers response was that of a ignorant person.i escalated the dispute and awaited response from alibaba providing them with full proof of the incorrect supply. MIA- the consultant from the Alibaba dispute department responded as follows:"Please note for this claim seller can resend some accessories same as old product, you can replace the accessories for the latest version, thank you"i informed MIA of Alibaba that the seller may send these accessories to change the items on the PC boards,BUT WHO WILL COVER THE COST OF THE TECHNICIANS LABOUR?so the question is , how ASSURED are we buying from Alibaba when the item fails or incorrect supply.they seem to cover for the supplier as they both speak the same language.Paypal on the other hand has protected there clients when receiving incorrect or faulty items.

name: Paul Micallef
review: This blender is incredibly strong and does its job perfectly. I am very happy to buy this type of machine from this company. My contact person was Ellen zheng. She replied to all of my questions and made feel important and safe. I highly recommend getting in touch with her.Paul Micallef - Malta

name: Timo Kakko
review: Easy to find products

name: Agris Malnaƒçs
review: don't buy alibaba. they pass on your data to fraudsters. alibaba platform does not respect data protection. i grew 3000usd and they don't care. they are only worried about profits, they are not worried about customer losses. still the same fraudsters continue to offer their product. there are other platforms where you can buy goods and keep your data safe. Don't risk your money and your private data

name: Consumer
review: I ordered a replacement part for a laptop. The Alibaba advertised that this part would fit my model of computer. When I contacted Alibaba about the problem they referred me back to the vendor that supplied the part. I was unable to get either Alibaba or the vendor to respond to the problem. Additionally it does not appear that the Alibaba customer service people have adequate technical background to deal with this type of product.

name: Edgie Garcia
review: I would like to thank Vincent and the company for taking care of my order. They are probably the best I've ever transact with in Alibaba. The products are in good quality and the service is very honest and excellent. I hope to have more business with you again. BIG THANKS!

name: Abigail Matos
review: Excellent treatment, excellent seller, I recommend them, they have variety, they send what you ask, they send you some products for you to try, trustworthy people

name: company A
review: Alibaba is a great site! We were able to start our e-commerce business because of Alibaba. We are so thankful and happy that we were able to find great manufactures and who offered great prices! The manufacturer we worked with had great customer service and provided us with great products so we are very happy! We recommend this site to anyone who is looking to start their small and or big business!

name: Enrico
review: I am sincerely satisfied with Alibaba.com: it is the platform that reduces the distances between producer and buyer, which allows you to select the producers and products that I am looking for.

name: Michelle Laliberte
review: I love Alibaba.com The company I've been going through has been 100% great. I get my products on time for my shop at least a day before due date. Haven't had anything missing in my orders. Customer service is spot on and returned in a timely manner (maybe a few hours before a reply since on the other side of the world) but no complaints. If your wanting to order from the stores on Alibaba just do your research and read reviews, ask questions from the stores. I recommend Alibaba without them I wouldn't be able to supply my store and my customers.

name: Gil & Anise Smith
review: This is my company's first venture into the Orient for products. I am very pleased with this platform. It is just a few keystrokes to meet, greet and compare the vast variety of companies and manufacturers available that are part of Alibaba

name: Kulan
review: Great service and I like the similar seller suggestion to get a depth of understanding about the products and their prices.

name: Pickard Trepess
review: I was very happy with the ordering (discussions done on WeChat) and the payment process which went ahead smoothly. The products were delivered in good time, which given it was the last minute before the New Year Holidays I was very grateful for.

name: Richard Gomez-Willis
review: I just had a newborn daughter recently, so my life has been upside down. I would have disputed my order, but I lost track of time. It would have been nice for Alibaba to send a warning email on expiry time to dispute, instead of me finding out suddenly after the time limit had expired. Now I'm stuck with faulty product and I may have just lost a lot of money.

name: Andrea
review: fantastic service, quality and product!

name: Dennis Calderbank
review: Alibaba have the widest range of products and should be able to source anything I require. System is also great and the people (suppliers) are usually a delight to deal with.

name: Cubling Cubes
review: Bought a few products from different suppliers to resell, so far so good, all items received in perfect condition, on time and sellers are friendly and easy to communicate.

name: Umit Punja
review: Amazing online platform. Sourcing suppliers has never been made easier. I am able to find reliable suppliers and products with ease.

name: ROB
review: Seller made promises that the product would meet me requirements but it didn‚Äôt and had a fault that they couldn‚Äôt correct even after sending parts. I used the trade assurance system but after going around in circles for weeks I‚Äôve given up and asked my credit card to intervene. At the moment I‚Äôm ¬£600 out of pocket. Very disappointing.

name: John
review: this transaction went very quick, smooth, received the product in good condition.  Thank You.

name: Mike Kivlin
review: Great working with Ryan. Easy to talk with and get exactly what I needed. This manufacturer has excellent products and will continue ordering from them.

name: Kao Lee
review: Excellent service as always to include disputes.  Sometime products received are not same as ordered but Alibaba reps were able to help navigate and resolve the situations.  The payment and refund system is just as fast as Amazon.  Great service, thanks.

name: Jim Gecz
review: Excellent customer service and product right to specs

name: elix
review: Be careful about all these one-line positive reviews. I am one of a number of people on this website and on the internet which have witnessed fraud and scamming with the alibaba part clearly accomplice of all the process. They claim to be a platform that serve the costumer, or which you can trust, but they give scammers a gold badge that cost a lot of money and sell your information to scammers. I purchased a chemical product and I have witnessed an enormous level of falseness and dishonesty. - Fake and clearly copied, misrepresented, fallacious descriptions written by incompetent people. - Gold supplier status given to companies that falsely claim to be FDA approved. This is a very serious offence. FDA is the regulatory agency for drugs. - The product was not in compliance with the description and the shipping label. - Most of the process is on the seller side, even the so called trade assurance, with the money going to a Singaporean account. - You will get tons of email from other seller, or scammers. Basically luring you with your own data, and getting paid to do so. Even tough I trusted the name and the brand, please don't follow my error !!! I noticed incongruencies but I didn't expected a fraud of such great proportions !!!I edit my post to add one more adjective. Forged. Nothing more than this word describe the alibaba site.

name: JULIETTE Ashmore
review: Great piece of kit..It worked and I am happy with the product bought

name: Kirk
review: Completely misled by supplier. Applied for refund and the Alibaba representative closed the dispute before I had a chance to view the information. If you want to pay to much for products that are poor quality and 1/2 the quantity stated order here! Criminals they are. Taking advantage because they assume you wont cause a dispute from half a world away. Be aware! Don't get taken advantage of like me!Make sure to verify supplier and try and find alternative to Alibaba.Hope this helps someone. Kirk

name: Matt W Wood
review: Alibaba.com is an excellent place to shop for big savings. The suppliers are very friendly & always to help with customers needs. They answer any & all questions a shopper might have & make order very easy. I'm very happy to have found this place to buy products & I know the suppliers will give me 100% satisfaction.

name: Janice Opex Corp
review: My experience on Alibaba has been excellent.  I was able to locate a supplier to make a custom version of their standard product.  Alibaba's website provided all the tools for communication and secure payment.  The whole experience was surprisingly simple.

name: Rui Abreu
review: I was the victim of a 10000USD fraud and Alibaba is an accomplice to it. Bought 5000units of a custom-designed pin/brooch. Alibaba's gold supplier Beijing DCSY INTL Trade Co., Ltd. sent 3 times a box each with 1 unit only inside. After I complain to Alibaba, the supplier sent a 4th box full of polyester men's ties.I submitted the images of the ordered pins (a 5cm felt piece) and a video receiving and opening the box with men's ties. Trade Assurance says they can't see the difference and closed the complaint, which cannot be reopened.If I would have ordered a car and received a bicycle, I am sure Alibaba Trade Assurance would say it is the same thing, because both have wheels.After my review in Trustpilot, Alibaba requested details on the case but stoped there. Nothing else happened.I went through their website and chated with a nice girl that escalated the case to their mediation team. The response came one day after: "the Chinese customs would never allow cargo to leave the country without making sure the product is exactly what mentions in the shipping sticker". Case closed. I proved them wrong but it made me think: the Chinese customs are ok with counterfeit goods but they will thoroughly check all cargo to make sure their factories will not send ties instead of pins/brooch...Finally, because I kept following up, their last answer before diving into silence: "file a legal case against the seller" because we are not going to do anything else.In summary, Alibaba is a casino. You gamble and if you lose, better luck next time.

name: Louisa Warwick
review: DO NOT trust Alibaba's 'Seller Protection'. I recently purchased $16000 worth of goods. The products were sent FOB. The seller sent the goods in inadequate packaging, causing all 2000pcs to damage in transit. I sent the proof to the Alibaba dispute team and they closed the case in the sellers favour. They claim I should be covered by shipping insurance BUT the insurance states inadequate packaging is not claimable. I lost $16000. Do not think you are covered by Seller Protection. Unprofessional and biased to their sellers.

name: JR Trading Online, LLC
review: Excellent product and service. I recommended

name: William H.
review: I have had no issues with Alibaba to date. Everything goes as planned. I am able to find the products I'm looking for.

name: Joseph B.
review: Excellent product , fast reply , very good seller - highly recomend to others.

name: Precious Rhoda Fatmata Kanu
review: i think Alibaba is a good shopping app cause it offers wholesale prices and all what have purchased are good product and also comes quickly.

name: Mikky Neon
review: Very good service and product. Shipped on time and is selling well.

name: Sandra Wiik
review: Very happy with the products I have gotten.

name: Mal Armitt - Konesar Ltd
review: Alibaba Buyer Protection is a joke. 4 days ago i gave a negative review based on my recent experience. Alibaba responded to my review and requested more information on the order. 4 days ago i gave them all the information they needed. So far no reply, no investigation. Alibaba is a con, their Trade Assurance Terms : "Your actual payment will be fully covered" and " if the quality of the products dose not match the standards set in your contract or the supplier did not ship the goods on time, you will be eligible fir a refund within 30 days of delivery" is full of bull.... What Alibaba mean is they only protect their supplier, not the customers.

name: Michael
review: Alibaba has been a fantastic stepping stone for my business.The company I‚Äôm going through for my product have been nothing short of exceptional, friendly, attentive and willing to go the extra mile.With everything, you must do your due diligence to find a good supplier and build relationships.Highly recommend alibaba.

name: Sohna's Choice
review: I joined Alibaba.com in 2019 and I was skeptical at first with the fear of getting scammed but I took the risk and am glad I did. Alibaba.com is 100% trust worthy and your money is safe. So far I made 10 purchases and very happy with the quality of all the products.One supplier couldn't manufacture my product for me after paying in full but I did get my full payment back. As long as you keep all communication on Alibaba.com and pay via Trade Assurance, your money is safe.The only down side of paying with Trade Assurance is that they charge you a processing fee of 2.95% of your total order which I think is too much. If they can reduce that processing fee, it would be awesome.

name: Casimira Mostyn
review: So far I have purchased products from two suppliers on alibaba and both times have been really successful. I have received good quality products at amazing prices from honest and helpful sellers

name: Ray
review: Outstanding app. Great job and love the product.

name: ÿπŸäŸÜ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ®ÿ±ÿßÿ¨
review: I have good information about the product and see it as good qualityBut I was more than happy to deal with the supplier as she was an excellent personality, Yuliya GongGood for dealing with me, to simplify things for me, and to quickly answer them and meet what I needShe deserves the full mark and all the love and affection from her

name: David
review: Very good site for buying wholesale, the verified seller and trusted seller filters when searching the website is great, allows you to sort out real wholesalers from questionable sellers. The messenger is useful too. I like that my order is protected until I confirm delivery and that the product is  what I ordered.

name: Pissedoff
review: Watch out people Alibaba is scamming people and will not help when you are scammed..... even though they state ‚ÄúSo if for some reason you place an order and you never get your products then Alibaba accepts full liability. Afterward, they handle disputes with the supplier for you.Alibaba wants to create an easy and safe buying experience for the customer. That‚Äôs why they guarantee your money back if your order didn‚Äôt meet the exact requirements you and the supplier agreed to.‚Äù Big Pile on nonsense as, when I made a dispute they responded they are unable to help.... now, I am over USD1,000 out of pocket.... bas****....... still no help from alibaba scammers........ alibaba and their 40 thieves!!!!!!

name: Bruno Cabral
review: Great platform for buying abroad with a good number of products and sellers to choose from. The platform is also easy to use.

name: Bartek Maciejewski
review: ok, in general.

name: Orlando Gordon
review: Amazing service tool and products. Easy use and secure

name: Hasan Ersoy
review: Good products and satisfactory delivery time.

name: Simona Postelnicu
review: it is a good experience. nice products, i will order again

name: Lynda Bouvier
review: Amazing service tool and products. been ordering from them every year. You can trust them, I highly recommend them.

name: Abudi The.rider
review: Is it possible to order one item instead of buying in wholesale wheather there is minimum of product is 1 ? And how to pay the amount of items we purchased ?? Through bank accnts or any money transfer ? Pls someone guide me !

name: Babak Nami
review: There is no "Add to Cart". Shopping on Alibaba is very difficult. No delivery time is indicated for each product. I prefer to shop on Amazon and eBay.

name: Jim Naeger
review: I have made a few orders on Alibaba.com and so far I always received the product I ordered ( perhaps not the 100% quality i had hoped for but I am very satisfied of what ever I received. I was hesitant at first to use Western Union and bank transfer however since I only use trusted and verified suppliers, that soon became a mute point and have full confidence in  paying in advance now and being assured that in the end I am going to get the product as ordered in most cases

name: Kulture Kombucha
review: As a kombucha manufacturer, I have now used Alibaba to order glass bottles in bulk twice, and twice have ended up paying over $1000-2000 more than quoted or estimated due to negligent paperwork and poor materials during shipment on the part of the seller. The first shipment I chalked up to inexperience on both our parts and trusted that the second shipment would go smoother. I ended up paying more on the second shipment, for an inferior product. I wasn‚Äôt even going to buy from the same supplier except that I wanted the same exact bottle as my first order, and had made that clear in my order, and instead was supplied with a bottle that is lighter weight, less durable, and shorter than the first order. When I escalated my refund request, Alibaba sided with the supplier despite evidence such as email conversations, photos, and invoices, they said that nowhere were specs given when I placed order, and despite supplier agreement to pay shipping through to Boston, I was additionally charged shipping from NY to Boston. Same exact bottle as last order means same exact specs as last order, not different specs. I would return all the products if the shipping didn‚Äôt cost the same as the bottles themselves, plus additional port fees and freight to my business location. I tried ordering bottles from another company through Alibaba, and even sent a deposit, but due to glitches in the website was not able to even start a refund request when it became clear that they would not supply the correct bottle. Fortunately my credit card company refunded that deposit. Do not buy bulk product from Alibaba, there is no quality assurance and very poor customer service.

name: Mohammadreza
review: The products and service are great! especially for the people in a hurry

name: Nicole
review: Very great experience shopping here and i got my products fast as well! The customer service was great and the quality of the things i ordered was great! Exactly what i expected if not better!

name: dato
review: A really successful and user-friendly platform for the first time I understood everything easily and I'm no longer afraid to order expensive products

name: yankl
review: My first shopping experience at Alibaba was excellent.Wonderful shopping experience!Perfect product. Fast Shipping!Everything is so wonderful!

name: Pamela Taylor
review: On time , any confusion or problems are taken care of ,, product very nice .. wish there was local supplier so shipping wouldnt be as high but gets her quick once shipped all the way from Hong Kong .. like 2 days ! :)

name: Gokmen Karci
review: I have purchased a number of items from Alibaba. Only one came as a decently produced product. The last item I purchased had a deceptive descriptor."Green Plant Wall Artificial Lawn Boxwood Hedge Garden Backyard Home Backdrop Decor Simulation Milan Grass Outdoor Flower Wall"No one would assume this product is not suitable for outdoor. Apparently I needed to ask if it was UV rated or not.It does not mention anything like this on their page.I escalated the dispute. Alibaba, like my previous dispute, judged in favour of the seller. offered me an insulting refund of $20US (my purchase was$134US). I asked for a full refund or for the seller to send me UV rated items (which would've been cheaper for them) but was insulted with the bad offer, on top of that, my intelligence was insulted.So far two complaints and both were on the sellers' side.Alibaba doesn't side with the consumer, even if they are right.It's been over a month since I uploaded this review. Alibaba commented and I replied privately, but they still left me in the cold. Still playing with me and everyone else. Pretend to be concerned but do nothing. so frustrating.

name: Franklin De La Cruz
review: Everything I have order has ran smoothly (pay, time, Communication. ec.) and shipments also have been on time.

name: Hans Meeussen
review: Alibaba did deliver as promised. Within a few days I received the products and they are working well

name: ƒ∞BRAHƒ∞M
review: Trade Assurance FAILThere's no any trade assurance. They are using this term only to market their product and entice more buyers.3 weeks ago I bought 2000 ring+necklace and paid 2200USD.The seller sent me completely different stuff like bitcoin coins and boxes and other kind of rings.Alibaba  Trade assurance is telling me to contact INTERPOL????they are biased and opinionated and protecting their own sellers.My money is wasted and I also paid 1000Tax before I open the box and know what was actually inside.NEVER TRUST EVER AGAIN.

name: Pamela Taylor
review: I ran into one supplier that was very difficult to deal with , as well as the fact that the product was not as described and that the representative was pretty unprofessional , I contacted Alibaba and my order was cancelled and my money was back in my account the next day . I just went to the order page and filed for a refund ( posted screenshots of the add and conversations between me and the supplier ) and Alibaba did their part . Its VERY IMPORTANT to take pictures and file everything you do so when you fill out these return or refund forms or disputes , you have your proof ! If you do then Alibaba does their job if you do yours !

name: Marko
review: I ordered a smart phone, my order was handled very quickly and professionally. I received it on time and am satisified with it. I recommend both, the product and the vendor.

review: I am writing this since Alibaba doesn't have a place to rate suppliers on Alibaba.  Ive been using Alibaba for years running into issues here and there.  Do not use ifreego/Shenzhen UVI Hi-Tech Corporation Limited.  The owner of this company is horrible (Kevin).  First and foremost he will make your items and make a set for himself.  He will then sell the same exact product against you with his price being $150 (on a $600 item) less then you.  He is a supplier who will compete against you. If I sold at his price I would lose money on the sale.  ( he told me business is business).  What an A hole.  Secondly,  My $17,000 order of electric bikes were bad!!!  The batteries didn't charge.  I emailed him and whatsapped him.  He was responsive when we were negotiating the order but then disappear once i told him the bikes were defective.  I am stuck with a bunch of expensive bikes that do not work.  Now I have to find the battery supplier and spend more money to get batteries and controllers that work and have to take apart and reinstall new $130 batteries.  Just digging myself in a deeper hole then I am already in.  Be aware and stay far away from this A hole an his company.

Please don't sale a bad product with high price, if it was a cheap then I don't really mind.. but so disappointed. And please Quality Control.
