name: Trung Dang
review: I have ordered from Alibaba several times.  I'm not a seller.  I'm just a guy who likes to buy items in bulk to save money.I have ALWAYS received product that I paid for.  I have never received some sort of rude awakening (you know, like the horror stories whispered in dark corners of people receiving rocks, or bunk supplements.)  Now, the disclaimer to that is that I am someone who deals in INCREDIBLY small volume.  As such small potatoes, it's just not worth it for a company to cheat me.  So I imagine is can and does happen.  It just hasn't happened to me!Also.  Alibaba isn't perfect.  You deal with a lot of reps who just don't speak English very well.  It can get quite frustrating.  Also, there are many, MANY companies that just won't deal with you if you are little.  I understand that it is not worth their time.  But that does mean I have to spend more time (and pay more per unit) in order to get my product.I have also had to back out of some deals because the shipping was so incredibly high.  One example being some work gloves.  It was like 125 for the gloves, and 100 for the shipping.  So the price basically doubled.  On top of that.  Every company that I have ever dealt with for free samples requires shipping costs to be covered for it.  "So here is your 1 dollar glove.  I will give it to you for free, if you pay me 5 dollars to ship it."Thus, the free sample situation is a bit ludicrous.  Even with the negatives; As a buyer.  For the love of Pete.  Protect yourself!  Do business ONLY on the site.  Pay through the site.  And filter your vendors appropriately.  I don't have a lot of money.  And I'm not buying a lot.  But I require ALL the bells and whistles when searching for a vendor.  All the verifications.  Gold rating.  The inspection letter from someone who has actually step foot into the factory.  I read reviews.  AND I look at how much volume they have done.  (Here's a tip.  Don't buy from the super low priced guy (or girl) who's been on alibaba for 8 years but has NO past transactions, and wants to do business off site.  That same person will ask you to western union them money.  So yeah.  Run from that one.)As far as my knowledge goes, Alibaba is only place to go in order to get me quality, generic, bulk items at absurdly price per unit dollar amounts.  With that logic.  They are on top of a mountain that has only one person on it.  That makes them 1 of 1.  Welp, that makes Alibaba the best for what it does then.So.  5 stars

name: Samira Ras
review: Good quality product. The only problem was about the samples. I asked for three products. poop scooper, poop bag and poop bag holder. But they got it wrong and didn't send the poop scooper.

name: J Brooks
review: Great site to source quality products direct from manufacturers/suppliers at a considerable savings from buying in country.  All of my purchases have gone perfectly thus far and I've been absolutely pleased with the outcomes and products.  Simply do your homework to know the supplier you're doing business with...communicate through Alibaba...and use trade assurance for the order whenever possible.  Some suppliers have been questionable, only willing to communicate through whatsapp and even if legitimate, I'm not willing to risk it.I've purchased wheels for my Porsche and some really nice kitchen knives thus far.  I saved hundreds of dollars vs buying locally here in the US.  The wait was pretty long coming from overseas but worth it.

review: I have been extremely happy with the ease of use of this site and the quality of products I've received from my supplier. e-commerce is a tough and very competitive business but Alibaba gives everyone a chance to make their own mark.

name: Mrs M
review: Alibaba works only with honest suppliers. There is NO BYERS PROTECTION. You can dispute, but their response is always the same, that you need to resolve the issue with a supplier on your own. We've ordered few times the samples for paper bags and dust bags, and paid for final order for garment bags, hangers and paper cards. Few suppliers and 90% of them provided severely damaged products. Paper bags had large holes in them, yet Alibaba response was they cannot interfere. Dust bags had logo printed uneven, which was not in line with the approved design, same Alibaba response. Garment bag samples were great, when we received final order, they were in poor condition - holes, shorter zippers, sewn in a way they teared after one use, smudged windows, logo printed in wrong location etc. Alibaba response - the same. The only good order we received was paper cards, but this was not the Alibaba's contribution, we just came across honest business. Hangers were ok, but still not as approved samples. Overall we've lost around $2000 due to dishonest businesses, which Alibaba supports and does not protect its buyers from. This was a lot considering we are a start up business. I must say I am very surprised the majority of reviews are possitive, considering the fact we were deceived so many times and did not get even $1 back from dishonest businesses presented by Alibaba.

review: Alibaba is getting better and better with more certainty for buyers around the world. It's a pity the third party freight charges weren't as reasonable (and are often over-the-top excessive). In fact exorbitant freight costs have killed a number of deals of late and this needs to be looked into.

review: I bought a product from Alibaba.com with trade assurance, the seller mixed the orders and sent me someone else's parcel. After I asked Alibaba.com to intervene and help me to get either the products or a refund. After one month of waiting and receiving messages from Alibaba ''that the seller sent the parcel, '' I decided to ask only for a refund. However, they agree to refund me but the DUTY tax paid for the WRONG product has not been refunded.Overall, poor service, quality of the products very poor Alibaba.com will protect the seller even when sellers do mistakes and cause financial loss to the buyer. I hope the manufactures will move away from Chiana so we can trust them again.

review: Alibaba.com is a great platform for business people all over the world to source products and manufacturers.

review: So far Alibaba is the best online platform for buyer, seller, manufacturer etc.It's NOT perfect, but it can get the job done.Problems are in the details where the manufacturer or reseller don't know their own products well enough or leave the description fuzzy in order to attract many buyers.Be aware, be specific and ask questions !This avoids later disappointment.

name: Eoin
review: In short: Ordered a product from a "verified" seller, with their much advertised "Trade Assurance" and tried to be as cautious as possible. I received a faulty, falling apart product. Started immediately the refund process since the seller refused refund, providing all the evidence needed (photos of the item at the arrival day, advertising photos from the company etc). Alibaba's trade dispute department backed their supplier, from which obviously they gain more than me, without providing any valid evidence. Seller just said product is new and the trade dispute department didn't feel the need to verify anything or even check the attachments I sent showing the item I received.Unlike most fake reviews made in from the country of origin of this site, this is a real one and hopefully will save some people from losing money. On the other side, if you like mystery packages and gambling, go ahead! :)

name: Okeh Jasper
review: My first experience with Alibaba went very well. It's a great resource for sourcing products from China, India, and other Asian countries. I think you need to be careful when you're working with the individual suppliers, but Alibaba makes it easy to find and to pay your supplier. Maybe I got lucky, but I found a great supplier (I used Trade Assurance and Gold Supplier options to find a supplier with proven reliability and quality). I have no complaints.

name: Kim Baxter
review: My first experience with Alibaba went very well. It's a great resource for sourcing products from China, India, and other Asian countries. I think you need to be careful when you're working with the individual suppliers, but Alibaba makes it easy to find and to pay your supplier. Maybe I got lucky, but I found a great supplier (I used Trade Assurance and Gold Supplier options to find a supplier with proven reliability and quality). I have no complaints.

name: Dr. Peter Niehenke
review: That's a very strong statement but here we will provide evidence that this statement is adequate!We, the AFEGA Research Group (our homepage is research.afega.net), are a group of scientists from Germany, France, Austria and Switzerland (including biologists, psychologists and a beautician), who, inspired by the groundbreaking research of Prof. David Sinclair, conduct their own studies on anti- aging and, above all, the effective anti-aging substances David discovered.The production of NMN is currently still very expensive. So, like many others, we were looking for cheap deals. We came across a scandal: The fraudulent machinations of some on the Chinese Internet platform Alibaba (the Chinese counterpart to Amazon) listed companies that offer cheap nicotinamide as expensive NMN and give this cheap nicotinamide the fantasy name Food Grade NMN. That's worth it, because nicotinamide costs about one twentieth to max. a tenth of what a real NMN costs.Trusting in the validity of several certificates, we ordered NMN for our studies at one of these suppliers listed on Alibaba: Shaanxi OWENS Industry Co., Ltd. Of course we wanted to check the quality of the substance delivered but we had to recognize that there is virtually no laboratory in Europe that is able to reliably analyze NMN. the scammer can therefore feel quite safe, because the customers can not easily check the quality of the delivered substance. And that's what they take advantage of!For us, a really unfortunate coincidence turned into a stroke of luck: 10 kg of NMN from China on the grounds of suspicion that it could be banned substances, were seized at the customs and subjected to an analysis. It turned out that it is cheap nicotinamide instead of the expensive NMN (Nicotinamide Mononucleotide). Finally we had found a laboratory in the US specialized in NMN analysis and this laboratory confirmed the Customs analysis. Thus, the fraud was objectively proven.It is no wonder that the company in question fiercely denounced this fraud and even went so far as to question the expertise of the state-owned laboratory and the internationally renowned US laboratory. They came with adventurous excuses.This case is so significant for anyone thinking of stocking up on inexpensive NMN in China that we have decided to document it in every detail.We felt reasonably secure when we ordered such a large amount of NMN in China as we made the purchase through the Alibaba platform and Alibaba offers a so-called Trade Assurance. So for us in the case of a fraud be belived we would be at least a bit protected.That was an expensive mistakeWe had to experience that Alibaba keeps its protective hand over its Chinese entrepreneurs, and of course at the expense of its Western customers. In our opinion, it may be formulated so sharply: Alibaba makes himself the accomplice of fraudsters. We were helped by an unfortunate coincidence: a large consignment from China was analyzed by a state agency before we could receive it. If we had the substance analyzed after reception itself in a so-called third-party laboratory, the fraudsters could have argued (and according to our experience we now know: they would have done so!) that they can not control whether the sample that we have given to such a laboratory for analysis is really also a sample derived from the delivered shipment of them. Read the documentation carefully, and you too will come to the conclusion that this is what would have happened.This excuse was therefore denied themOf course, we are aware that fraud is not always present if a customer does not receive the ordered goods. There are mistakes, and the supplier of course tried to convince us that it indeed was just a mistake. However, he had to explain how it is possible that three times in a row, three successive deliveries at intervals of weeks (initially 1 kg, then two and then 10 kg) should have always come to the same error.After a long search, we found a laboratory and sent in the samples from the first two deliveries. By the way: Each analysis of a sample costs $ 290! In both cases it turned out to just be nicotinamide. The third and last delivery was analyzed by the customs lab without our intervention, with the same result.More importantly, before we found a lab that could analyze NMN, we found a lab that could not analyze NMN, but was able to determine if the substance is nicotinamide. There was evidence to suggest that the substance delivered actually WAS nicotinamide. We confronted the supplier with these indications. It is a piece of cheating art on which adventurous excuses Dorothy, the company's online saleswoman, tried to reassure us. It could not be nicotinamide, she assured, because that would not even be produced in her company.So, relying on Alibaba's Trade Insurance, we applied for a refund We expected the company to resist our allegations - but they did not - and seen we understood that they didn't need that, that Alibaba holds it's protecting hand above them. The only thing they did was send Alibaba an excerpt from our WhatsApp dialogues, in which we agreed to a false customs declaration. That was a clever trap we got into: we knew from colleagues that there were always difficulties with customs at NMN because this substance is virtually unknown in Europe and NMN is currently not approved as a dietary supplement in Europe. Therefore, it often happens that the customs does not give out the corresponding consignments to the recipient and let them go back. They are not allowed to do that because NMN is not a forbidden substance. But it happened again and again, happened even to us when we sent a colleague 100 g NMN (of which we thought it was NMN) by mail and received the shipment back. (Piece of evidence)So we agreed to the misdeclaration - and that's what Alibaba used against us: they completely ignored the fraud, the objectively proven fraud, and refused to regulate, saying we were guilty because the consignment was withheld because it was not declared correctly.We were stunned by this reasoning, because customs did not know what the analysis would be. It was a random sample, and it was suspected that it could be drugs or other prohibited substances.Alibaba trivialized the scam as the "quality issue" and demanded that we agree with the scammers about this quality issue.The cheaters were eventually even willing (at the urging of Alibaba) to take back the 10kg, but only under the conditions that they were sent back (so the Customs did not, for example, retain or destroy them).We believe that regardless of the customs problem, there is fraud, that, objectively proven, the ordered and promised product has not been delivered and we therefore have the right to cancel the contract and get the money back. Alibaba had very, very much understanding for the poor swindlers, who understandably only want to have their material back (by the way: 10 kg of nicotinamide cost just about 180 dollars - it went with the order but $ 10,000!).Alibaba continues to ignore the existence of fraud altogether. As I said: they hold the protective hand over their Chinese entrepreneurs.The really scandalous thing about it is that Alibaba, through our evidence, objectively knows that at least this company is cheating but doing nothing but nothing at all to protect other customers from these scams. The company is still listed on Alibaba and continues to offer this fake NMN, which they call Food Grade NMN. At Amazon such a company would have been closed for a long time: Not so with Alibaba.It is truly justified to say that such behavior makes Alibaba the accomplice of fraudsters.

review: Alibaba provides a fuss-free and trustworthy platform for small businesses all over the world to be able to reach out to suppliers. name: Zaheer Abbas
review: I have very good experience to buy online with Alibaba. My products are very good quality no issue at all. Thanks

name: Ziya Onat
review: Wonderful product very happy with service and product. Thanks

name: Royally Made
review: I was really happy with the multitude of choices regarding products. But the experience it is not so good. So, if you make an RFQ, it doesn`t matter what you write, because the people who respond don`t read them? It is a waste of time to wait for their reply when you ask the price and then you find out that their MOQ is 3000 pcs instead of 1000 pcs you put. I even put out pictures for the product I wanted and the companies that responded didn`t  have it.Also, with the payment. If you pay on Alibaba, it will cost you super extra money...like even 24$ for 1 purchase.. not good!!(although if you don`t pay on their platform, you risk loosing your money. As they are not accountable if the company you use is not fake).The prices listed on products are fake. I lost alot of my time making and calculating prices and then when I talked to the supplier the price was doubled or more... The quantities as well. Someone posted that MOQ is 1 piece. I wanted 100 pcs they said that the MOQ is 1000 pcs... than why did you put 1 pcs? Most of the companies awnser really late at messages and you have to wait alot. I do have some awesome experiences with some of them, they repplied immediatly and were quick at solving every problem  and trying to meet my expectations! And also, the search bar could use an improvement. They don`t show what I write, and even if I use filters for what I am looking for exactly, they show you what they want... it isn`t helpfull at all. I think Alibaba should keep an eye on this things and help our experience be more thrustworthy of them.Overall, my experience with alibaba was great and bad. If you have alot of time (some of it to waste) then I recommend it. They have some good companies, they have a lot of products for you to choose but you have to be patient and have alot of time. Also alot of money!!! But some of them have really good prices and they even make good quotations!

name: Ss
review: We purchase thousands of pounds worth of products using their trade assurance. The supplier delivered faulty low quality goods, even though we'd paid much higher than the market rate to guarantee the quality. Turns out all their so called trade assurance is is a mediation, where they "try" to get the supplier to compromise. Alibaba will not do anything if the supplier refuses to give you back your money or to compromise. The whole thing is a scam. Shameful, dishonest and misleading. You're better of paying directly with a credit card or using PayPal, at least you'll have some sort of protection. I'm so disgusted by both Alibaba and the unscrupulous suppliers on the site.Ps:If you use your credit card but still pay via alibaba's, your protection may become void. There needs to be a clear link of transaction between you and the supplier - paying through alibaba breaks this direct link! Just be cautious.

review: Whatever you do,do not place an order with this incompetent company.They will take your money,send you the wrong product and refuse to compensate you.We ordered $5500 USD of Garage Door springs from them,after they ensured us they had the correct product.If you are in the Garage Door Industry you would know,that torsion springs must be of the exact precise size otherwise they do not work and are of no use.Well since this company did not have the sizes we ordered,they just decided to ship out,alternative sizes that they must have had,and needed to get rid of,knowing that they would not be suitable.The springs were not the sizes we ordered and were no good at all to us.After dealing with AMY YUAN,who is a completely incompetent person,as she dealt with the order from the beginning.All we got from her,was "Sorry"... there was no compensation,they would not re ship out the correct order,so we are left with $5500 worth of the incorrect order which cannot be used.WARNING do not ever deal with WUXI YONGHONG TECHNOLOGY CO as they will steal your money and provide you with the wrong product,and DO not deal with AMY YUAN as she does not belong in any capacity of business,at any level.She is useless.

review: It's a bit difficult to open the batteries allocation for one of the models. All other open very well upon making some pressure in the notch to free the batteries box. One you set the label in and close the box well, it will remain completely closed aisolating the label from water or whatever. The SDK they provide comes with DLL's in .NET and bring a document explaining  how the SDK works too. With a bit of knowledgment in .NET  you can very easily make your own program to send the data to the labels.I'm very pleased with the product and once I finish the program to manage the labels, I'll come back to them for the labels.The delivery was very fast in just 4 days with DHL since I ordered. review: There are too many good things to like about this product. I have installed it permanently in my boats engine room (exhaust extension & extra air cooling and venting required). Great quality, small size, quite quiet & fuel efficient running. It does everything I require it to do: Bulk charges the battery bank and powers the electric engine simultaneously. With 48v to 12 volt inverters it will run the whole boats electrics & electronics. But the real beauty of this powerfull little beast is the confidence it gives you in having standby driving & charging power at the flick of a switch. Which incidentally, can be simply extended from the dash to the genset. So pleased with this necessary accessory, I have got to say: If you don't have one; get one. The price for this Fuwang product was less than the postage. Now saving my pennies for another one. Its Christmass time!!!

name: Customer
review: After hearing the Alibaba CEO come and talk to our organisation about the disruption they'd created in the market and the rapid growth they where experiencing, I looked at the reviews and thought I'd give them a go. So I decided to order my wedding favours off Alibaba the items seemed ligitment, process was easy and was assured the trade assurance would cover any issues. How wrong I was?! Was delivered I realised they were fake; the photo used on Alibaba was the stock marketing image from the US website, the item colour was different and when I re-ordered the official product off the US website it weighted 35grams more than the Alibaba product. When I tried to dispute this I didn't get a full refund and I'm now $150 out of pocket and still have the terrible fakes they no one else wants. It was honestly the most stressful and disappointing situation and I'll never order again and when ever anyone orders from Alibaba I encourage them to think twice!

name: David Smith
review: Scam ---  I was chatting with a ""Verified & Gold Status"" supplier for over  a week.  They offered a great deal.  Website, product,  sales agent all seemed good, then a payment invoice was sent.  I went to pay and they insisted on  "Wire Transfer" - No Fraud Protection - once your money is sent no way to get it back.  I Suggested PAYPAL & Credit Card (2 layers of fraud protection - if product is bad get refund).  The Chinese Sales Agent said "okay" she said she would have her "billing Department" email me a payment Link.   Over 1 weeks no payment link and no communication.  The person went black. Just Gone!!!  I contacted &  no response.  The EMAIL replay says ""Email does not exist...delivery error"".    Alibaba is a Scam these Chinese sales agents try to get you to send 1000's of dollars "wire transfer or other direct transfer"  online with no Fraud Protection.   You won't be able to take any action internationally without some form of Fraud Protection.   Chinese Asian Scam.

review: Regarding some inquiry to quote a product, Alibaba system invites other suppliers -besides the original- but nobody knows nothing about my requirement, so with all of them I have to start from the scratch again and again: How many, what type, what material, what size, what color, etc. etc.Besides, Chinese vendor usually doesn't have something like a scaled price list (by quantity, by type,...) and everything is "a negotiation".For clients like me in the other part of the world it means many days of what seems a never ending process.A final quota may take several days to define.I know the price is good but I feel it is an inconvenient, time consuming process.

name: Mr. Kris Kumaroo MBA, MS
review: Alibaba has been part of our import/export experience, using it for the excellent trust and accountability features.The safety aspects are the most appealing part of the Alibaba program. The fee is essentially an insurance premium at a hugely reduced rate. Unfortunately, most manufacturers are looking to do very large orders, in the thousands of pieces, vice hundreds or even minimum orders of under 100. You'll find out the level of customer service with SE Asian companies,  is almost directly proportional, the more you buy, the more features, discounts, quantities and perks. It hobbles small businesses looking to test products, graduate introduction vice a five thousand piece buy, and have the product fail. Many companies outside of the SE Asian market, such as Pakistan, India, Turkey, do not have the full Alibaba suite, and do not conform to the payment structure. They also don't have access to PayPal, Payoneer or other accountable payment systems. Many want direct payment, such as Western Union, Moneygram, or bank transfer. We highly discourage this. You have zero control of the manufacturing process, delivery, or quality control at that point. Stick to safe methods and you'll have a long and prosperous business.

Messages seem to be assorted in randomly. If you have searched various products previously you have to go through a hundred messages hoping to find the one you are looking for. I just tried it again and find myself having to go through messages up to six years old trying to find one I received a month or so ago.The whole message page is cluttered and difficult to navigate.All I wanted to do was to find a quote I received from a company whose name I cannot remember. I have been searching for thirty minutes and found everything but what I am searching for.All they need to do is put messages in date order or enable product search in messages. Surely that is not impossible?

name: Daniel Offer
review: Alibaba.com is generally a good way to identify suppliers from China, however, be warned - if you get a bad suppler. The trade assurance program is absolutely worthless. It claims to protect your money, but when it comes down to it, they're on the suppliers side regardless. It's pointless. You might as well work with suppliers directly on negotiated trade-terms external to Alibaba. I ordered something from "Yangzhou Lingdong Musical Instruments Co., Ltd." and they send me the wrong product, it was unfinished and broken. Yet, wouldn't accept a return or refund. For a $500 AUD item. Represented by "Charles Diao" this company takes photos of high quality products, and sends out junk. Don't trust them. It's also worth mentioning that you can't review a supplier with whom your in dispute, or you have a negative experience with. As such, you can't trust the reviews on the website. You need to think of Alibaba.com as a way to identify suppliers, not necessarily a way to do business.One star review as it's important to point out the terrible trade assurance program, it's not what it says it is.

name: Magdalena Audisio
review: I just had a really bad experience buying in Alibaba, not only because the vendor but also from Alibaba. Don‚Äôt expect any protection from Alibaba, if the product doesn‚Äôt works, prepare to loose your money.Like three months ago a bought a body composition analyzer to a vendor called NewAngie. Despite I took all the precautions making sure the vendor works with trade assurance and is a gold supplier, I read a lot of reviews, checked the vendor,  but still everything  went wrong since the beginning. The vendor tried to communicate through email and WhatsApp, and don't through Alibaba,  I had to divide the payment in three parts because the card didn't went through the Alibaba.  The machine arrived without any manual or instruction, we had to figured it out how the machine worked by ourselves, they sent useless manual through  WhatsApp, the  2 YouTube videos  available are also useless, our only contact with the company barely writes in English  and doesn‚Äôt have a technical background, so it took a month or more make the machine work.  The machine now works with some  little issues but we have a big problem, all the results and reports that the machine provides are in Kilograms.I tried to make they understand that in United States, the standard weight measurement is in Pounds. They never mentioned that detail in their product presentation. All the scales provides results both in kg and pounds, this is a $1,500.00 scale,  so at least  you expect  to have  results everybody can understand. But NewAngie keep saying that they sell the equipment in others country and they don‚Äôt see the problem.When I decided go to Alibaba to have my money back it was even worst. They said and keep saying that I have to solve the problem with the vendor. I sent them videos and pictures of all the Issues the machine had, with no answer. They sent me a list of third party inspector located in Changai with a fee of $500 to check the machine, but told me no call then, wait to solve the problem with the vendor. When the last tried to solve the problem failed, Alibaba told me that It was nothing they could do because  I failed to set up an appointment with the inspector on time. I sent them back their email, but the person in charge of my case acts like a automatic robot just replaying the same thing, I asked for a supervisor but they won‚Äôt provide it to me. The Alibaba online chat doesn‚Äôt works neither. Conclusion: I am stuck with a machine that I can‚Äôt use, loosed my money, and my time. My advise: Don‚Äôt use Alibaba, they don‚Äôt care about their customers.

name: labbianlibey
review: 1. It is inappropriate that the order item in the order-related AliBaba page, is marked as received, while in reality the order has not yet been delivered. In fact, it is still under customs inspection in Estonia. The order is complete once the product has been received.2. FedEx is a low quality courier. They are always poorly capable of handling customs matters, and lack the indispensable business personality for making customs officials understand that respect towards the customer is essential, and that items cannot be detained without any valid, explicit, and sound reason.FedEx should never be used for delivery when a person is able to choose other delivery companies. Internationally, FedEx exists only because customers often cannot pick directly the courier whose service they wish to avail themselves of.3. AliBaba should not only provide a review field for the seller, but also for other aspects of the order. In fact, the aspect of delivery is as important as the professionalism of the seller. If the delivery company fails, the seller fails too.

review: Never buy anything from alibaba, they are criminals who sell poisons.Never buy anything from alibaba. They themselves recognize that their products are 80% false. I bought 2 kilos of DIM (3'3 'Diindolmethane), another 2 of powdered pomegranate, 40% ellagic acid and 100 grams of Nicotinamide mononucleotide. I had a problem at the Spanish customs and they solved it by issuing a false invoice. This made me suspicious. I took the products to the mass spectrometry department of the University of C√≥rdoba where they confirmed that all the products were fake but that, in addition, the NMN was actually a poison called ISONICOTINONITRILO that is toxic by contact, inhalation and, of course, ingestion . I sent them the results of the analyzes and they told me that they were not acceptable proofs and that I sent them $ 500 to do an analysis. Of course I refused. They never returned the ‚Ç¨ 640 that I paid for the fake products plus the ‚Ç¨ 400 that the analysis cost me. Now I am with the concern of more than likely poisoning since I took several grams of product before knowing the results of the analyzes. Anyone who wants to see the analysis can write to me at naranjayvioleta at yahoo point and I will gladly send them. Besides scammers are criminals and, worst of all, being in China have immunity and I can not report them.

name: ReviewQ
review: IF THERE WAS ZERO STAR I WILL GIVE...I got scammed and Alibaba says it's a third party that hacked the account of the supplier! Alibaba did not bother to check the listings in the supplier page, did the hacker list the products too? without knowledge of the sleep Supplier? Alibaba did not bother to contact Western Union to expose the identity of the Scammers, didn't even bother to contact police to track the mobile numbers I provided to check the identity of the two Scammers linked to the accused account Alibaba just said it's a "Hacker"! what proof Alibaba got?  I provided Phone numbers, Western Union Transaction Numbers, and Conversations between me and the Scammer. Alibaba Provided me with "Its a Hacker".So avoid Alibaba not only it's filled with scammers it's also apparently  run by liars. maybe also a Hack-able platform by the word of mouth of Alibaba employee who contacted me... Here what they sent to me.. ----------------------------------------------Thank you for contacting Alibaba. With regard to your complaint case (8893229), we have checked through the case and please be informed that the root cause of the issue is an unknown third party, who hacked the account of the supplier, and illegally using the account for fraudulent activities. The supplier's account will be handed over to our concerned department for further processing.However, in terms of your great loss in the issue, we feel sorry that we could not assist you in recovering it, since the issue is involved with an unkown third party.To better protect your benefits, we sincerely suggest you try our Trade Assurance service on Alibaba.com for your future order, which covers buyers on Alibaba.com with 100% payment protection with their selected Trade Assurance supplier. Please kindly click following link to learn more about our Trade Assurance service:---------------------------------------------[Here is my opinion]:You can Track Payments and Criminals, I don't believe it's a Hacker, if it was a Hacker you can track him from the Western Union accounts he provided me with which I gave you. You can track the Mobile numbers he used to contact me which I provided you.. You have no excuse you can investigate. I used your Alibaba.com chat feature to contact the supplier using Alibaba.com system. I TRUSTED YOU now you have ZERO Trust you are responsible. if you want us to only use your Trade Assurance Service why you let Offline Payments. If I used your Trade Assurance What grantee I have your mouth don't lie and say "There Was a Hacker" It's clear you are allowing this chaos. Then run away when fraud gets exposed.Alibaba.com you better track the scammers down now or expect more people like me to continue to talk and campaign.

review: Very good service and products. thanks.

name: Charmaine Whitehead Hall
review: I am the Owner/Director of a Company Ltd and recently began trading with Alibaba .The product I purchased did not meet the trade agreement; it was completely different to the sample advertise.  The material was very inferior so I returned the products. The money it cost for Tax and return postage was over ¬£60. I am still excercising my patience as  I have not received my refund for the products as yet.Since there were other items I purchased and did not received I cancelled the order. Equally, I had problem getting my refund & did not get the same amount paid. I paid ¬£270.60 and  my refund was ¬£208. Still dealing with other disputes and there is no way of speaking to anyone once they close the dispute and paid what they want into your bank. You are on your own. Please be very very careful. I was warn but did not listen.My advice is to be very careful before you press the button.   Also when trying to escalate a case with Alibaba the system will not send the message so the time lapses for your response . Is this done to prevent people submitting their evidence?

However, after the problem, Alibaba has started showing a warning that the selected product may not be delivered to my country. This will save confusion and additional cost to potential customers in the future.

name: ernesto quintanilla

name: Lori Fox
review: I want to start by saying the quality & craftsmanship of this product exceeded our expectation. The detail work & proportions of the animal are exact. We are very pleased with the piece. The downside to our order = it was late by 2 months. We were needing the item for an event at New Years Eve (USA). This order was paid for on Nov 13 2018. We were told it would take 17 days to make with an estimated delivery on Dec 10 2018. On Feb 14 2019 we received the item. This was our first LARGE order with China and we were not anticipating the amount of fees that would be tacked onto the shipment of the item. $459 to get it out of the port, then another $110 to get it from the warehouse. Our Freight Forwarder did not tell us the item was in Dallas so we were frantic trying to figure out how to pick it up from the port in California. The Freight Forwarder was quick to respond, but just left out some key details to help us understand what was happening. I recommend this biz if you have the time.

name: Morris Stephens
review: Great prices and Quality products, I would recommend finding great sources from alibaba. My products always arrive on time and un damaged.

What a waste of time.
